comments: I like the concept so far. I always wanted to play Sims on the go; now I can. I wonder if this game simulates life accurately. You can't have a life sim game without being able to make your avatar a member of the LGBTQA community. This is why I like Second Life. It allows me to be me (gay and proud) and doesn't judge. Will definitely add five 🌟 s if this feature is added along with In-game events that allows you to pursue your chosen lifestyle.

ANYONE WHO GIVES THIS GAME A LOW RATING NEEDS TO SIT DOWN . I love that u have more customization with face and body structure similar to the way you do on Sims 4. The graphics in general are nice. My favorite part is that it's online. I love being able to chat with other Sims users and add them n stuff. Also am glad its not in real time ... I hate having to wait hours on FreePlay to get stuff done. This game is best. Lovelovelove

I was so excited that the game is finally released untill when i want to start the game, the game starts with just the opening EA and Maxis title and then the game close it self. Is this a bug? My phone works well with other heavy games but how it cannot run The Sims Mobile?? Please fix this and i will change my rating! I use Lenovo Vibe K5.

So far so good. Its better than the Sims Freeplay. I'd love it more if it was more like the actual sims. Please change the way this game is. Make it to where we can cook, and choose our sims personality traits, have babies, die lol/legacies, go to work for 8 hrs and actually make a decent amount of simoleons, actually have freedom you know? The actual sims gameplay!!! I love the task list and how we do have to unlock new worlds and items, but it'll be more exciting to unlock stuff to me if this game was more like the original sims. If we had the opportunity to play all day non stop like the original sims, I believe everyone would enjoy the game more. Please make a change to the game and make it more like the actual sims!!!

In short.. been waiting to see what this had to offer.  Not a bad game. Granted it is way Better than "sims freeplay" however I expected more from EA. It's a nice app. Gameplay is good. Graphics are better than I thought. The in app purchases are what will get you.  For me though the Sims pc is where it's still at, for me anyway nothing beats the PC Version either Sims 3 or 4 Both are very good.   But there's enough here to tickle anyone's fancy. Hats off to the devs on this mobile game version!

The graphic is better than I thought. it is not that amazing but it better than the freeplay. I'm not a good reviewer and I still playing this game but I must say that I love it. there is no silly wait for 1h real time to complete a task. thank god. but getting a furniture kinda hard? for me. tldr, im good with this game. it amazing and I love it. I've been waiting for this game to come out cause I can't play the sims on my laptop. there a lot of things I still need to discover and I easily get bored. so let see how long this one keep me entertain. sorry for english tho'
description: Express your creativity as you customize your Sims’ distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and décor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims’ lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, fall in love, and establish a legacy. What stories will you tell? CREATE UNIQUE SIMSCustomize Sims’ appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.BUILD THE PERFECT HOMEDesign your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take them out to discover awesome venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub. SHAPE YOUR SIMS’ LIFESTYLE Guide the stories of your Sims’ lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms. PLAY TOGETHERHost and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people’s Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, vote for the most popular Sims as they make their way to fame.There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!____________Important Consumer Information. Some images shown may contain in-app purchases. This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Allows players to communicate via the in-game party chat feature. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.comVisit http://help.ea.com for assistance or inquiriesEA may retire online features after 30 days' notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates.

comments: Good game to pass your time. Upgrade costs and parts spawn rates are reasonable if you only use a few vehicles because it will take a long to yo max out everything. I think it will be better if league vs trophies distribution are reworked because its very easy yo reach legends. should give a higher win bonus at higher trophies i think to make it more competitive. And lastly, hackers should be deleted from leaderbord.. there are a few impossible timings on the board.

I enjoy the game greatly. It's slightly different with  the chest and stuff but it is sure nice to get bonuses every now and than. There are new adds though which I'm not super stoked about like the brake time adds but they keep them short and can be skipped quick if you have already watched them. All and all great game

I love this game. Every game I've had, I played for a week or so, and uninstalled. But this one? Ive had for almost 6 months. Been playing every single day. Finally reached legendary 32, I've unlocked everything. I love the VIP subscription and upgrades it gives you. I would like atleast one new vehicle option every month or so. Or at least a new adventure spot. Making a modded version of the rally car would be fantastic. Also, an upgrade on the formula car where it doesn't almost dead stop after it lands from a big air.

If you don't want to give away free stuff from the chests, don't. But stop wasting my damn giving me these "free" coins for watching a video only to have the ad freeze %95 of the time. The are plenty of other free games out there, might be time for a change.

Pretty good game the Ads are insane and they want a ton of money per month to get rid of them. Seems to be the way all the games are going. For the Chinese new year could have mad a tuk tuk I think it's called a mini taxi. Or something cool for China.

Enjoyed the 1st game but, game 2 is pocket book wrecker, you can only go as far as you can pay to go. Everything is 4 times $ higher than it was in the 1st game and advancement is much slower. Just not that exciting for what it now cost, will probably uninstall soon.

description: One of the best fun games for downtime, Carry Over the Hill!Carry Over the Hill is the most addictive of all fun games! Once in a while we need to rest our brains from information and problems, so why not try luck with a building game? Put your fingers to work with our top fun app, and kill some time while you are waiting. Show your creativity, basic physics knowledge and try to end this awesome puzzle game. There are many construction games out there, and no doubt, they are all fun but Carry Over the Hill will challenge you, annoy you, and if you get anywhere, you will get the feeling of accomplishment. Building games are getting more and more popular these days because they don’t require effort, but they make you easily hooked. We made sure that our fun app can satisfy everyone from 7-77 (or nowadays 2-102), and everyone who loves construction games will find this to be a perfect fit. Furthermore, it is also a physics game, based on driving and constructing, so you can put your skills to the test. If you enjoy building things, this is a perfect building game! You can build single wheeled, two wheeled, three wheeled vehicles, or maybe a tank? With this fun app you have 4 in one, building game, construction game, physics game, and puzzle game. The last part is especially important for parents who need a distraction for their kids while they are busy, what better than a fun game. Our puzzle game will keep your kids entertained as long as you need. There is no violence, guns, or any aggressive moments, so the puzzle game is absolutely safe for your kids. It will even challenge them to think, work with their logic, and progress in logical thinking. However, this fun game is not made only for kids, it is a perfect construction game for everyone, regardless the age. The very goal of this fun game is to carry all your fruits to the end of the road as fast as you can. So the speed of the game will test your motoric skills. Beautiful and colorful design will satisfy the eye, and the simple physics game plot of the building game makes it even more addictive.Give our physics game a chance and let us know how you did. We make fun games in a bid to satisfy the gaming community, and if you feel that something is missing, or have an idea on how to make it better, feel free to get in touch and share your thoughts. If our construction game has a glitch or a bug, please don’t let it slide, let us know the details so we can work through it. After all, we all making fun games because of you, so let’s make them even better together!

comments: Only problem I have is an overabundance of chests that you get stuck with and can't possibly open them all on time and it makes you lose out on getting gold chests or Diamond chests. It would be really nice if you can choose to dump any of the chests you don't want. Or swap out the ones you have in stock for the newly acquired better ones after a ranked match. Other than that, awesome game

This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

Fun game. But you definitely have things to fix. Like the fact that sometimes when you win, you still lose. And I'm not talking about having less gems. I'm talking  when the other player doesn't even in the hole. Definitely a glitch. Also, as far as controls....easy enough. But sometimes while I'm in the middle of a backswing, the ball will shoot on it's own without me releasing it. Which sucks because it's a wasted shot and usually costs you the match. Aside from those two irritating problems, it really is a fun game. I will continue to play, hoping you fix the issues.

Game cheats, puts you against lower lol players with better equipment who make ungodly shots, or much higher level where you don't have a chance. I hit things that aren't there, and with a crossword my ball will fly into the wind with no action. Opponent Always get better wind and direction, and will outshoot you work lower equipmeny.
The game doesnt allow you to get a proper pull back on your swing. To much clutter on some stages. Plus those who play too win always beat those who dont
description: Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★KEY FEATURES - Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer. - Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike! - Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies! - Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun. - Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves! - Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top. - Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus. - Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion! - Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge! - Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts! - Play online matches with your family and friends!* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news! https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/* You need an internet connection to play this game.* Optional Permissions - Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.  - Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.  - Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches* How to turn permissions on or off - Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off. - Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.
descriptionHTML:
Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!
Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!

Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!

Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!

Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!

So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!

★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★

KEY FEATURES
- Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer.
- Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike!
- Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies!
- Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun.
- Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
- Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top.
- Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus.
- Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion!
- Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge!
- Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts!
- Play online matches with your family and friends!

* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news!
https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/

* You need an internet connection to play this game.

* Optional Permissions
- Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.
- Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.
- Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches

* How to turn permissions on or off
- Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off.
- Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.

comments: It's actually really fun, but every time you die it doesn't start the next run correctly. Like for me the ball just doesn't show up, it's weird. But since I'm enjoying it, I just press the pause button and then restart. Once they fix this glitch, it will be a great game!
I am having the same glitch where the ball does not show the socond time you play it. Pls fix this, but other than that the game is still fun and addicting 😂
The game keeps glitching out because when I click on play it shows no ball so I have to restart then it works then it doesn't. It's a cycle you need to fix. Besides that it is a good game
Well This game Is Great but it has some issues the first Is when i restart the Ball doesnt show (lot of People have these problems) and if You fix it then 5 stars for You
Great Concept! But the game is so "slow" and laggy. Sometimes I have to restart the game Because the ball doesn't show. Plz fix and I will be happy to give 5 stars.

description: Är du trött på de gammalmodiga gränssnitten för ordsök? comments: I expected the physics to be as flawless as Turborilla's MX games but they're not at all. Clunky, inconsistent physics leave you shaking your head and trying in vain to sum up what you did differently than the 100 previous attempts.

Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

Awesome game!  Earning money is easy especially with online play and watching ads.  ONLY downfall is earning gold can be a pain,  seem like the only way to get gold is by beating a boss, buying gold with real cash and levelling up which can take some time.  Other then that it's a very addictive game if you love BMX that is.  Folloq me on instagram @evans_customz

Very good game but I wish there was a better way of getting gold without having to pay out of your hard working money. Since when did games start asking for cash? I would pay to buy the game but buying gold is stupid as hell.. either way very good game
Game is very addicting but after a little while of playing you can't hit jump or land! Maybe just me? Also, I don't want to pay for upgrades. Should be merit based on how well you race.

Disappointing...the game would easily be 5 stars, as it is very fun, but once you reach a certain point, it becomes pay to play as you need gold to upgrade your bike to stay competitive with the CPU rider.  Can't even play anymore because it's impossible to progress any further.
description: Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! descriptionHTML:
Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! See for yourself why Mad Skills games have been installed more than 40 million times worldwide, by action sports enthusiasts, professional athletes, and casual gamers alike. This is side-scrolling racing action as you’ve never experienced it, racing against people from across the globe on carefully designed tracks that will challenge your skills and — sometimes — your sanity.

- Amazing physics that combine elements of realism with arcade fun
- 7 different bikes that can be unlocked, upgraded, and customized
- Tons of rider customization options to help you achieve your own on-track look
- Dozens of hand-crafted tracks, with more added every single week for free
- Weekly Jam competitions carried over from the smash-hit game Mad Skills Motocross 2
- Competition with friends, people from your state or region, and international players
- Evil bosses to defeat — a Mad Skills first!


Mad Skills BMX 2 will get major developer support, ensuring tons of meaningful updates in the weeks, months, and years to come. We already have additional game modes in the works!

Learn tips and tricks by watching our weekly show, The Turborilla Show, at twitch.com/turborillagames!

comments: This is easily one of the top 5  free game apps I've ever played. Yes, it gives you the option of buying gameplay, but it has more than enough gameplay for free. I can't tell you how many apps I've installed, then uninstalled the same day because of how boring they were or how the only way to actually accomplish anything you have to pay. This game is flat out awesome!

3 stars and I'll explain myself.   1. The game is very addicting and fun, the looks are nice and must I say I love how the northern lights strain look when it's fully grown.   BUT   2. There aren't many strains, would be cool if you could create alot more strain by mixing or idk discovering by accident. Those would add to the game. The game feels like there isn't much to do once you get so far at a given point
Will have to stop playing, massive battery and overheating issues. CPU load is too high. It's just lagging my phone. Shame quite enjoy the game play.

I love this game. Only complaint is that with the latest update I can't rotate my screen the opposite direction. Definitely not a deal breaker, just extremely annoying when I want to charge my phone while paying. Definitely something you guys should look at.

Awesome and fun to play, if you managr your resources well then it doesnt take forever to level up and you dont have to pay to get anywhere. Awesome free stuff sometimes to help you out when you're down, and the story just continues and never loses its spark. Very fun and many things to do other than just grow weed and sell it.
it's a very addicting game that I would recommend to my kids.  Cause it shows them the ethics of real life.  And honestly who doesn't give weed to babies these days...?

descriptionHTML:

description: Welcome to the world of Merge Kingdom!, where everything can be merged, and your only object is to heal the land. You’re the ruler of a vast kingdom, whose land has been struck by a terrible plague. In order to save your kingdom, you need to save the land - the only means of doing that, is by merging objects. All of the trees in the game can be merged. The more you merge, the stronger the objects become. The stronger the objects, the better they will be able to heal the land. As you merge and heal, you will unlock more and more land, growing your Kingdom.Think you can merge to save your kingdom? Try Merge Kingdom! today!

comments: Good looking game ruined by slow combat.   You have 4 team members in the beginning, each with 3 abilities. But only one ability can be used, and everyone has to wait 5-6 second global cool down to be able to use a next skill. Global CD on top of the native cool down is not fun. Each battle becomes just an auto attack for 2 minutes, and takes strategy straight out the window.

Would be nice to be able to actually use skills without having to wait agonizingly long for every single skill to come off cool down, even though you only used 1 Skill.. And then have to wait 2 minutes for that same skill to come off cooldown. Too long and too boring. Fix cooldowns and you might have an interesting game

The game pretty much plays by itself. You enter into a level and it's a one time boss fight and so far that is all there is to it. As far as customization goes you can only equip ruins. I don't think there's an option to change weapon or armor. Lots to read in the tutorial, the lack of voice overs doesn't really bother me. Graphics are good and you can unlock some pretty good main characters, more at level 4. If this was an open world with full customization it would have a been an amazing game. Overall, it's not the worst game on the market!

No reward for pre-register player? Already have 2 master, but disapoint coz cant play 2 master together.. Bad gacha system, need summons stone but still need gold to summon, chance to get hero *4+ very low..

Firstly, the game is beautiful. Secondly,  a way to improve on this game is to let users switch off full auto,  meaning turn based mode,  just like Summoners War.  Thirdly,  prices are way too high on everything.  Fourthly,  game launches with little to no reward. A welcome gift of sorts would be appreciated.  Fifthly,  Some hero voice overs would be nice.  All in all,  a beautiful game marred by the usual greediness of their makers.

This game is a disappointment, coming from all the hype it garnered. Graphics is good but gameplay has no originality and needs no input from the player. If you're into this game and wants more player input (like positioning of healers/tank and DPS during fights) try Velator. Same quality with actual need of player input.. I'm in Velator. Guild Elitists.

descriptionHTML:
A Dark Fantasy, Collectible RPG

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

[Features]

■ Be a Light in the Darkness
- Shine light upon a world shrouded in darkness. The war will only end when light shines upon every inch of the land.
- Expand the territory in any direction you desire!
- Mobs are no longer in your way, Exclusive Boss Battles Only!

■ Collect Masters & Servants
- Form your Crusade among 5 Masters and over 100 Servants.
- Enhance, Evolve, and Awaken to unlock their true potential.
- Diverse Roles for each Masters & Servants: Attack, Defense, Support, Healer.

■ Devise and Strategize
- Your Master is the key of your Crusade, customize your Master's Skills for every battle.
- Unleash Combo Skills powerful beyond measure with perfect Master and Servant pairings.
- Customize your Rune Combination to gain unique Set Effects.
- Couple the various different Skills and Elements to assemble the most strategic Crusade.

■ Heed the Savage Battlefield
- Pulverize your opponents in PvP mode to prove your power.
- Preserve your Towers! Defense is the first step in strategic combat.
- Challenge yourself to various dungeons and earn rare rewards. Godspeed!

■ An Eerie and Mysterious World
- Not just another RPG! Immerse yourself in a magical and mysterious fantasy world.
- Cute yet bizarre, uncanny yet charming! Masters and Servants are ready to accompany you on your journey.

* Heir of Light Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/HeirofLightGAMEVIL
* Heir of Light Official Forum: https://m.gamevilusa.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?1896-English

▶Required Permission Guidelines
When using the app, we may ask permissions for access to provide the following services.

[Required Permission]
- Storage: The authority is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.

[Optional Permission]
- Phone: The authority is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
- Contacts: The authority is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

** This game is available in English.
** There may be additional costs when trying to obtain certain items.

* GAMEVIL Official Website : https://www.withhive.com
* GAMEVIL Customer Support: https://m.withhive.com/customer/inquire

Terms of Service: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html
Privacy Policy: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html
summary: The acclaimed gothic fantasy RPG is finally here. Rule the Darkness.
title: HEIR OF LIGHT

description: Draw.ly is an amazing coloring game designed for adults and children.  It’s completely FREE!  No need to subscribe, all pictures can be unlocked with coins!  There’re tons of interesting pixel arts for you to color, and more updated daily; you’ll never run out of coloring materials!SUPER EASY GAMEPLAY: Fill the pixel blocks with color by number, and you’ll have a piece of super cool pixel artwork!FREE COINS!  New pictures and tools can be unlocked with coins.  Earn more coins by finishing and sharing your coloring pieces and get TONS of coins upon first login!Draw.ly isn’t just incredibly fun to play, it can also help children develop better hand-eye coordination, ability to focus, and recognition of colors and numbers.  It also helps them practice drawing and coloring skills.For adults, Draw.ly is really stress relieving.  Just relax and enjoy a session of nice and comfy color therapy!Download for FREE now and have fun coloring!
descriptionHTML:
Draw.ly is an amazing coloring game designed for adults and children. It’s completely FREE! No need to subscribe, all pictures can be unlocked with coins! There’re tons of interesting pixel arts for you to color, and more updated daily; you’ll never run out of coloring materials!

SUPER EASY GAMEPLAY: Fill the pixel blocks with color by number, and you’ll have a piece of super cool pixel artwork!

FREE COINS! New pictures and tools can be unlocked with coins. Earn more coins by finishing and sharing your coloring pieces and get TONS of coins upon first login!

Draw.ly isn’t just incredibly fun to play, it can also help children develop better hand-eye coordination, ability to focus, and recognition of colors and numbers. It also helps them practice drawing and coloring skills.

For adults, Draw.ly is really stress relieving. Just relax and enjoy a session of nice and comfy color therapy!

Download for FREE now and have fun coloring!

description: Happy Wheels is an obstacle rag-doll extreme sports game, your goals is to reach the finish line, you will encounter various obstacles that can damage your character.Happy Wheels is a fun and free game is fairly easy to understand and play.Fun game and funny.When you get bored with your office work , sitting at the table is just full of paper . Why not have a rolling down the hill under blue sky with csr bike race game on the bicycle wheel?.Drive your bike into a very happy adventure racing under hot sky.Welcome to Happy Wheels A very happy csr bike race game. You will be a racing biker drive your wheel in the hot racing , your task is tap screen to dash and rolling down the hill, crossing the river, under shining sky and then go finished . Sometime you run like a dumb guy, just find the ways to die. Keep in your mind alway drive ahead, no return, it just dash ahead and ahead , waiting for a little fortune.. If just a small dumb mistake or you’re not a fortune man, many ways to die, your csr bike will be destroyed as a torn piece of paper by the death race.Tap the forward button to dash, tap turn left or turn right button to rotate your wheel in the air . When encountering obstacles tap stop button to decrease the speed. All you need is timing to tap the buttons and a little fortune.This game is a rag-doll extreme csr sports game. Experience the real physics based racing game on your phone, Happy Wheels offers an exhilarating mix of amazing tracks, a little of fortune and deadly challenges. Feel the dash speed as you negotiate your way through the deadly survival courses. Perform death defying wild stunts, witness bone cracking impacts and lose a limb or few, and take it to the extreme!Experience the feeling of rolling down the hill under blue sky with bike race is wonderful, drive rolling ahead the hill, dash crossing the mountain, paper flower is falling in the road. Or just like a dumb guy drive the csr bike to the dumb racing and find the ways not to die. Huge chainsaws, thorns, watermelons, pineapples and many others want to tear off a piece from you!Happy Wheels a game in which all you need to survive.Download now and join your friends in the fun! Play NOW!

Happy Wheels is a rag-doll physics Arcade & extreme sports Racing game in which you can jump off buildings, crush the glass & avoid obstacles & spikes and arrow

Happy Wheels an exciting game with sadistic inclinations and black humor. The essence of the game is extremely simple: you have to get to one of the vehicles to the finish. The problem is that not every part of your body will get along with you. Huge chainsaws, thorns, watermelons, pineapples and many others want to tear off a piece from you!
Happy Wheels a game in which all you need to survive.

Download now and join your friends in the fun! Play NOW!
summary: When you get bored with your office work
title: Happy Wheels

comments: It's getting frustrating.. I'm into level 14, have up graded skills and equipment but yet still can't manage to get a bronz let alone a silver or gold in the very first jump in the game. Along with finishing a constant 16th about 95% of the time make me think it's rigged. What's up with that??

Fantastic concept and artwork and potentially amazing game ruined by a half arsed tutorial and lack of information, pure laziness.  The fun of the game turns to frustration as you get good distance and terrible scores, but why? You assume landings but the game gives you no information on correct technique. Also same for takeoff and mid air lift.   Come on devs its lazy and ruining a game with huge potential. Uninstalled...

Took me a little while to get the hang of the controls but it's fun once you do. Could maybe do with some hints to help get the best body position in flight, as this took me a while to figure out. Otherwise, it's a good time sink.

Sometimes it makes no sense. You are coming from quailication as 7th, you jump to 2nd position so surely you cant finish worse than 8th? WRONG. You end up on 16th place which is impossible. There is no in between you either win or you finish 14th or lower. You have 30 pts lead in front of number 2. after 1st round, you slightly fail your 2nd jump, guess what? 18th place for you! If you jump for example 120m on a K90 in Q, you finish first because everyone jumped 20m less, sudennly in 1st round you need 130m to secure your first place because everone managed to jump extra 30m. All in all fun, but still needs a lot.
No idea how the take off works, seems to be a perfect sweet spot but no tutorials to help you find it. Deleted
The game is very good. I like the ice cream helmet! The graphics are good, but when you fall over you look crazy. But other then that I love it. Good work!!! 💖

descriptionHTML:
Mega Monsters is a Q version mobile phone game operated by Teebik inc.

We have exquisite picture, maverick protagonist, cool and gorgeous battle, strange and novel mega monsters. Colorful activities will bring you adventure, exciting and other unprecedented game experience.

The most important damage in game is from the pet. Which can control the attack speed of pet is clicking on mobile phone screen , and the corresponding pet attribute will add extra damage to the Boss.

description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

comments: The problem with this game is simple.  It's inconsistent.  It lags at random times, and the hold function is randomized. Sometimes it's a fifth of a second for a full jump, sometimes it's a half second.  The game lags and stutters enough to make any real progress completely impossible for all but the most determined people with too much time on their hands.  1 point for hurting Trump -1 point for crappy design  Making this a solid 0 rating game.

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Nice game Not true curling but closer then any game I have played so far and it's still fun.  There seems to be a glich where stones jump to a different position after the throw, but doesn't happen often.  There is no hog line violation and it's difficult to promote so most games end up being a culster f in the 4ft.  Once you realize it's a game and not real curling your addicted.

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

comments: I love the game!! Thank you so much! It's just what I wanted to relax! so far I play it every day! The 80s neon style is great! I can't wait to see how the game grows! The graphics are well done too! I personally would like to see more trippy lights and colours  reacting to the velocity and frequencies of the songs and  perhaps a bit more speed! Maybe a bit more anti-gravity with some corkscrews and loop de loops, jumps..y'know that sort of thing!Keep it up guys, looking forward to seeing what happens next :D
I would've liked to play it but it says it only supports mp3

What an amazing update! I've followed this game since the first time it's launch, and it's getting better and better. Would be much more impressive if you can add Quick Play mode (random race on random music) and an option for premium mode which you can remove the ads (I know you have to earn something from your hard work, but can you consider this? Cuz I'd definitely buy the premium option). Please consider those two and thanks a lot for your amazing work.

[ new review ] The update which was released yesterday has improve the game by quite alot. Still, it'd be awesome to see more improvement to see more improvement on this game [ old review ] This is one of the best game with high quality graphic. Everything in this game is smooth. However. There's too manything thats going on in the screen. It hard to know what to dodge and what to collect. There's no time to react to stuff. Still the graphic can hide it away. But it has turn the game into an uneasy situation.

I love it! I was looking for a game like this a few weeks back, but gave up. Along comes this, with a FANTASTIC 80s vibe! That's just my speed! My only suggestion is that there should be lanes, because I can't quite tell where the points are until they're right in front of me. It makes it hard to plan moves. However, it certainly isn't anything to get you less than five stars. Bravo! P.s: for any Duran Duran fans out there, "the reflex" works BEAUTIFULLY.

I think this game is marvelous but I do think there should be more to it like multiplayer maybe? I also found that I played the retro map more than the first one cause it just made me feel sick and I couldnt see the light cubes properly and it just felt abit too hectic. I also think that the levels should flow better if u get what I mean like flow better with the song. Don't get me wrong though this is a great game but this is just a little bit of constructive criticism

comments: I love this game it's so fun and addicting. The highest I've got so far I'm playing 20 minutes is PVC. Whoever the creators are good job. I've never found a game like this. I'm giving it 5 stars. This game will take me awhile to complete great time killer as well.

Why is this game so fun? I accidentally played for 1 hour straight. I usually play games for about 5 minutes until im bored. Please, keep updating this masterpiece. I love the medium-paced gameplay. At least it seems like that. I love it! You even get to choose if we want to watch an ad or not!! I recommend people play this for at least 20 minutes to see how he gameplay goes. Chances are, people only rate bad because they did not even play the game. I create video games myself, and alot of people for some reason either dont play it and rate it bad or play it for 5 minutes and rate it bad. I never rate anything bad unless i have played for 20 minutes straight, and even then i usually never rate one star. Thank you for this masterpiece.  EDIT: I have played for 4 hours. I have a few suggestions now. 1. Please make the watch and ad rewards a little less OP. I know people wont click them as much but then it wont be so easy to get an ice or fire gun. Also, one suggestion i really want to have in this. For you to choose witch gun, drone, or target you want to use. It might sound useless i know, but it can be used for challenges and things like that. Thanks.

description: Manage your own smart car wash & gas station to provide car services including washing, paint job and designing. Play Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station and drive luxury car to refill fuel at the highway service station. Get behind the wheel of muscle cars and drive towards the city service station in car wash games 2018. Put pedal to the metal, park smart car inside automatic car wash games for cleanup and do exciting car customization. For complete engine repair & highway service like oil change, maintenance park inside the auto repair shop. Drive smart car around metro city and park at the highway gas station games to refill the petrol in car washing games.  Luxury cars are arriving in the highway service station for cleanup and car customization, so you as car mechanic have a tough job to do. Get behind the wheel to drive and park super muscle cars at the gas station parking. The luxury cars are directly coming from dirt racing tracks and some of them were involved in police car chase. Entertain yourself and take the smart car in repair garage for inspection and complete engine service in car washing games. Check smart car engine, bumper, alloy wheels and rims to ensure it's clean. Exterior rollover smart car wash is automated system where you drive your luxury car inside the bay. Once your police car is in the correct position, a signal informs you to stop. At that point, the muscle car wash equipment moves over your smart car on a track, performing a specific function, such as applying soap and rinsing like other car customization games.After cleanup at the car wash games you will be able to design and customize highway service car the way customers desire. For designing you will be using various vinyl stickers to give incredible look to muscle cars just like in car mechanic simulator 18. Drive luxury car inside the paint shop to change the color and remove stains, rust and scratches. Operate your gas station and complete smart car parking & driving tasks in car customization games. The car wash station is fully automatic all you need to do is park the luxury car inside car wash and repair games. Simulate your world and tuneup police car engine inside the repair shop garage. The repair shop garage is located next to the paint shop at highway gas station games. This repair shop garage is equipped with all the latest car mechanic simulator tools. description: For the sake of making the war technology, the scientists mistakenly install the malware program in the robotic machines. Now robots machines are going to make confrontation with the humans and they are now ruling the humans of the grand city.Robotic machines take the charge of the beautiful grand city in the Multi Iron Eagle Robot vs Robotic Machines action simulation. Gradually evil robots are increases in numbers and these vicious monster robots seems everywhere on the earth. If these unpleasant things happens continuously than we will find the humanity by a chance on earth. The scientists of the world also made a revolutionary change in the multi Iron Hero to save the humanity on earth.Enjoy the most demanding Multi Iron Eagle Robot vs Robotic Machines action simulation that especially designed for the technology and the robotic games lovers. Your favorite multi Iron Hero especially made with steel body and can transform into a robotic eagle bird. Appraise the angst feeling of the people of grand city they are moving towards the safe places because the beautiful city is going to be intensity robotic battle filed. Amazing camera angles and realistic sounds effects made this game to the best robot game. Choose your favorite multi Iron Hero with amazing robotic eagle bird against the dynamic robotic battle in the grand city. Playing as a multi Iron Hero, you can attack on the rival’s machines and upon the beast gangsters too with your ice firepower as well as with the nimble martial art combos. You also can change into robotic steel eagle, fly in the air of grand city to watch the vicious activity of the criminals as well as attack on them with the fires. These monster robotic machines contain the bulk of weapons inside them, and they are going to destroy the grand city. The brutal gangsters are behind robotic machines. The rival’s robotic machines can attack with their double fire guns. Moreover, the criminals can attack on you with the powerful martial art combos. You have to show your multi-functional fighting skills and downfall your rivals as soon as possible. Get more score in this futuristic simulation so that you can unlock the other Iron hero and robotic eagles. 3D city environment and realistic battle with machines made this game crazier. comments: A challenging game and also unique puzzle game

Complicated,  yet amazingly fun.  Keep playing!   Refuse to let this game take me down!   LOADS OF FUN AND FRUSTRATION!  Love /  Hate with this game....but it's the one I keep coming back to! Every once in a while I get a weird message and have to uninstall then reinstall app.  That also gets frustrating.

This used to be my favorite match 3 game of all, but lately every level is impossible unless you get JUST the right amount of luck in the gems that fall. I'll give it a few more tried and then I'm uninstalling it.
After 4hrs got to level 6 & couldn't even get close to progressing further. Seemed no point in playing the same level over & over & over again so I quit, you win (but you lost me)

I had rated it 5 stars even though it's tough to pass some levels. It took me more than a year to get to the 18-20th house & then an update sent me back to the beginning. :-( I don't play much anymore.

Relaxing - challenging, love the graphics Update: I was recently out of town and happened to check my bank account thoroughly for something else - I found all kinds of charges I didn't make but came from this game. It came to my attention because I didn't have time to play, not to mention I don't care how long it takes to pass a level so rarely pay for anything to pass a level. LOTS of unauthorized charges - I'm speechless and just sick. Had to cancel my card. I'll NEVER submit a card number for a game again - unless it's a throwaway visa - it would be the only way I would purchase in the future. Its a fun game -  DONT  let them into your account. Just...dont.

description: Ever dreamed of becoming a Blood Test Doctor in Hospital? Make your dreams come true with Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator! Where you can experience being a Blood Test Injection Doctor in hospital full of crazy doctor, cure patient or use all your skills to perform the surgery simulator in Blood Test Doctor Hospital! Apply injection simulator to patient Arm & buttock and collect blood samples in test tubes to test diabetes & other Infection disease. Start Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator with patient’s IV before going to emergency hospital surgery room for surgery simulator. Become an emergency blood test emergency doctor in hospital simulator, start understanding hospital emergency medicine and methods along with IV fluids injection. The Er Emergency Hospital is crowded with patient that have various blood related diseases & you are the only doctor at the hospital who is going to treat the patient. Collect blood sample, test blood and analyze it with a microscope. With proper care and medicine, the patient can recover quickly. Insert cannula on patient hand to let the medicine get into his body quickly. A needle prick may cause slight bleeding from patient skin. Clean away the blood with a cotton swab.Practice your injection skills on sick patient in this Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator game. There might be inexperienced nurses & er emergency doctor who cause pain while injecting medicine with injection simulator. Get to the surgery simulator hospital now and attend your patient coming in er emergency ambulance. The poor patient have painful expressions and a fear in their pretty little eyes. Treat them with all the doctor tools and injection simulator at the er emergency surgery hospital. First you have to rub some numbing cotton over the area of body on where the injection simulator syringe needs to be put. From there you will take the blood test and other injection simulator tasks, be careful when you prick a needle. Apply an antiseptic cream with a cotton swab to avoid any bleeding from patient skin.Features:* Amazing injection simulator surgery games.* Draw blood from patients vein with injection.* Collect blood sample and test it with a microscope.* Send the blood sample to the hospital laboratory.* Use ER emergency doctor tools & injection to save lives in hospital.* Practice emergency surgery steps to perform surgery simulator.* Treat serious injuries on patients in ER emergency hospital surgery room.
descriptionHTML:
Ever dreamed of becoming a Blood Test Doctor in Hospital? Make your dreams come true with Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator! Become an emergency blood test emergency doctor in hospital simulator, start understanding hospital emergency medicine and methods along with IV fluids injection. The Er Emergency Hospital is crowded with patient that have various blood related diseases & you are the only doctor at the hospital who is going to treat the patient. Collect blood sample, test blood and analyze it with a microscope. With proper care and medicine, the patient can recover quickly. Insert cannula on patient hand to let the medicine get into his body quickly. A needle prick may cause slight bleeding from patient skin. Clean away the blood with a cotton swab.

Practice your injection skills on sick patient in this Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator game. Here you will run with the loveliest Ninja rabbit in forest. Speed up to surpass other rivals to be the fastest runner!It is a wonderful forest adventure but it is not easy to complete the task. You need to jump over faults, dodge traps and keep away from dragons, elephants and tigers as well as those sweet elves with carts. descriptionHTML:
Run Ninja Fun Run is the best endless running game! Come on to challenge your friends and breakthrough their records in this game.
Welcome to explore this endless running world! Here you will run with the loveliest Ninja rabbit in forest. Speed up to surpass other rivals to be the fastest runner!
It is a wonderful forest adventure but it is not easy to complete the task. You need to jump over faults, dodge traps and keep away from dragons, elephants and tigers as well as those sweet elves with carts. Collect energy bottles during the way to help you run farther!
If you are able to catch a dragon as mount, you will be unstoppable for a while. The most fun in game is to run after robbers and take back your gold.
Be confident to face with all the obstacles! Run as far as you can to be the winner!
Unlock new scenes to experience different running style! Collect more gold to build your home in dream!
Are you ready to start this wonderful running adventure?

Features:
Fantastic running scenes
Run as far as you can
Comfortable sound effect
Fun of building unique homeland

descriptionHTML:
Command your vessel, aim at the enemy ship, fire them to death and win the battle!

This is a fierce 3D Warship Sea Battle game where you need to beat your opponent and win!

Gain your gold by sinking your opponent, buy and upgrade your invincible battleship, and dominate the sea!

Game Features:
◆ 3 types of warships: cruisers, destroyers, the main ship;
◆ Warships have six grades, a total of 24 warships;
◆ Generous reward system, log in to the game every day can be rewarded;
◆ Global leaderboard showing you the rankings of players in the world;
◆ Suitable for Android 4.0 above all mobile phones;
◆ No WiFi, no problem, can enjoy the game offline.

Gameplay:
◆ Left joystick control battleship move onward or backward, or left and right steering;
◆ Sliding the center of the screen to move the standard;
◆ Click the telescope button, zoom observation enemy ships;
◆ Click the Shoot button to launch a ship cannonball.

Sea battle war is coming! Thousands of enemies are coming!

Ready to sink the enemy to dominate the ocean yet! Come and fire!!!

description: Mountain Assault Shooting ArenaReload Your Assault Gun, More Enemy Army Troopers are Coming.Welcome to a brand new shooting game of 2018. The enemy has swarmed in the jungle and are conducting offensive strikes against our country. The armed forces cannot engage with any full fledge frontline pvp battle. Because this could rage war between two countries. But this thing need to be tackled within no time to stop cover strike commando. The enemy has also build up hideouts and are attacking from behind. Now the strategic reply should be given from our side by our commando. For this, the high command has hired a commando to crush the enemy forces. You have to play the character of war strike commando. Your ultimate duty is to retaliate the enemy attack. The jungle is very dense with a lot of cover, so war strike commando needs to be very careful.The gameplay of this game is very thrilling. Players of every age will definitely enjoy with dozens of sequenced frontline pvp battle levels. The initial missions are very easy as compared to last ones. Because the difficulty level increases as you proceed more inside the war strike commando game. You are the only best man to conduct operation in a jungle swarming with hostile forces. There are different weapons in the armory that you can use in cover strike commando game. But only primary gun is available and you have to buy other stuff. The mission tasks are different in each mission of this covert ops commando game. This will definitely test your shooting skills to a whole new level. Furthermore, the gadget includes mini radar to show your position on the ground in this covert ops commando game. You will also get paid with cash on completing each mission. Spend it to buy new weapons, med packs and grenades to win cover strike commando game. You should be prepared every moment, because the enemy is battle hardened and well trained.The controls of this frontline pvp battle game are very easy. Even players of every age will enjoy their spare time with fun. The button placement is ideal in this war strike commando game. You have one section for movement and other to perform actions. The action buttons include fire, reload, change stance and miscellaneous to provide ease of playing this commando pvp shooting game. You can also have a strategic look via radar showing enemy positions. So paly more and enhance your experience in commando pvp shooting games.Best of Luck…! Commando Grand Shooting Mission 2018 Features:Realistic 3D graphicsDifferent weapons availableDozens of missionsReal in-game soundsDifficult tasks with a lot of coverSequenced missionsMed pack, guns and grenadesIf you have no wifi, you can play Commando Extreme Deadly Attack 3D, absolutely free.So quickly download this interesting Commando Extreme Deadly Attack 3D game of 2018 offered by Gamers Pulse Inc. available on Google Play Store on your android smart phones.

comments: Not completely sold on the game. Major problem: hoarfrost was not designed for touchscreen! Trying to clear the frost moves the screen, pulls down drop down menu from the top, pauses repeatedly, zooms & unzooms repeatedly...nightmare! Game has too much going on with collections, story, various games....to enjoy the game. I like the parts where I find stuff. The rest just gets in the way and bores me.

It's fun. It reminds me of another game I used to play, not sure if it based on that or by another company. I find the puzzles OK. Some are getting a bit difficult. I enjoy playing it but I get the feeling very soon I will have to spend some real pennies and when that happens I will probably stop playing.

More complicated game mechanics than most hidden picture games, but the game walks you through them very well. Instead of a linear path, you are given the choice of several quests to choose from or you can ignore the quest and play any stage you have unlocked. Completing quests helps you learn more about the game world and its inhabitants. Very enjoyable with several mini games as well.

Good game and great entertainment so far, been playing for about 10 days. Some levels challenging but not enough to be discouraging. Good way to develop focus, observation and memory. Those rubies are hard to get though and expensive in real money...

Addictive game play, with an interesting storyline.   I appreciate that the object placement is random,  although the visibility in some of the special levels makes it particularly difficult to find everything without using hints and tools.  I've been playing now for almost a year, and there seems to be unlimited potential for long-term gameplay

I'm addicted to this game.  You don't have to spend money to enjoy it either.  Illustrated beautifully and I love the fact items move around plus also have different modes to keep you intrigued. I only find it frustrating not having enough energy to keep seeking

There is no difficulty progression, there are levels that you don't even have to jump in order to win and there are levels that spawn you on spikes making them impossible. The only way to win the game is to watch ads to get past the buggier levels. All around a terrible experience.

Way too many ads. Also to add onto the ads, it sometimes spawns you to where you spawn right on top of the spikes. I think, if they could fix this, the game would be great. Its a great idea, poorly executed.
Way to many ads. Can't even play without an ad popping up. Really annoying. And it'll spawn you right next to spikes so you'll immediately die.
Don't recommend this to people who have anger issues or want relaxation. Too difficult at times. Good game, but I hated it.

comments: This was my favorite game as a kid. Of course I played it on NAMCO museum for PlayStation. The controls were perfect and the entire family loved to compete. This version looks the same graphics wise, but these are the worst controls possible! Too small space and the fire button and move buttons aren't very responsive. I looked for this game before and it wasn't in the store now it is. Want to rate 5 stars but please fix the controls first. Too hard to play and enjoy at the moment.

Will change to 5 stars after 2 things are fixed. The controls need to go from a Dpad to a joytick style. And only one fire button is needed. Other than that this is amazing and perfect I will even buy it or donate if these problem are fixed. Also just a little line to show the center of the screen since the score board is on the side. Many classic galaga players rely on knowing where the center of the screen is for bonus stages

I was so happy to find this, but the controls are horrible. I've got the galaxy 8splus and the controls are as big as the screen. Very hard to play. Fingers are tripping all over themselves bc of trying to fire and moving left/ right.  I give you huge props for it being exact, please fix so more of us old people can play! Never appreciated a joy stick so much. 😉

Its the actual Galaga but the controls are horrendous. Please fix asap.  I don't know why they stuck with a d-pad and A and B buttons.  Modernize the controls.  Tapping anywhere on the screen should allow you to shoot.  Sliding your finger left and right should allow you to move.  They should allow for 2 different control options classic and modern.

If the controls were better, this would be 5 stars. This really reminds me of my childhood. I was around 12 years old when this came out. Great retro game that is authentic and gun, except for the controls, they don't respond all the time and the placement is bad.

You should be able to change the on screen controls to your liking, the on screen d-pad has and up and down button that does nothing and it just takes up room on the screen. But this is the closest to the real thing on the whole Play Store and it's still fun.
description: The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
descriptionHTML:
The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.

A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.

Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.

*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
summary: Controls a starfighter to destroy insect-like enemies

comments: Greedy devs are ruining the game. It may be f2p, but it's a p2w game. Now the devs have taken away even more ways for the f2p players to get many needed items. Don't waste your time with this game. I've submitted several problems only to be ignored because I don't spend enough.

This app used to be good now it is completely utter trash.   They want you to pay to win. We're not a bunch of money, we're players that deserves a good game, without bugs and good f2p ways, this is our answer for all those new changes. Abusive changes: Batteries, troop transformation. Stamina limit in events. Multiplayer Relics. Free daily points to any enabler. Worst rewards of limited events. I don't understand the developers in this game.   They seemed to use to care.   What the hell happened.   I recco you DO NOT install this game.

As everyone says, it's heavily p2w. Started off decent but now... Not only that but there are SOOO many bugs. Contacting help is worthless as they either don't respond or give some auto response.  Finally, it's a compulsive liar. You send ALL your troops out and upon exiting the game it tells you your troops have returned, every time... when they haven't.

Game is pretty pay 2 win, people with 1 million power attack other player that have 60K power. This game is pretty unfair and their need to be a limit on where they can attack. A level 20 or higher shpuld be able to attack below a level 18 or such. Developers don't care about cheaters as well. They leave the comment section when you report them and don't say anything. All the developers want is money, money, money.

I installed this game for the waifus, but was disappointed. The main interactions are brief "dates", which are badly translated. The rest of the game is fairly complex with things like base building, alliances, resource collection, etc. But the instructions are few, and the translation is pretty bad. Without good instructions, you have to guess the game mechanics. The worst part is what other negative reviews keep repeating. I didn't believe it at first, but now I know it's true. Powerful paying players teleport near your alliance for the battle event every 2 weeks, or permanently camp your alliance, and destroy all of your alliance's troops or steal your resources. That makes the game unplayable, because there's nothing to do when you have no resources or troops left. There are various and frequent bugs that require you to restart the app to fix.
Could've been better without the scams to not steal our earned overall rewards like today. More lags, chat lags, scams daily. More unknown errors.

Once you have found the word or symbol then you will be go to the next level, how far are you able to go? Show now your friends how genius you are ! . But can you do this?

The topic of the conundrums are general .. from words , symbols like tide pods or uganda knuckles.. you can see the variety is huge !

Solve This in 30 seconds was popularised by youtubers life pewdiepie and markiplier. They made many videos talking about this challenge.

Are you sure you want still to play? Will you press the button to play?

para retener a la gente mas de la primera partida
summary: Are you a genius? Solve This in 30 Seconds !
title: Solve This In 30s
