description: Airport Show is an exclusive stunt driving event and you’ve been invited to take part! Welcome to the high stakes, high-octane driving competition for the fiercest drivers! The biggest monster trucks need only apply!FEATURES:▶ UNIQUE STUNT ARENA: Drive around an old airport!▶ AWESOME MONSTER TRUCKS: Each vehicle handles differently▶ 70 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE: Drive, do tricks, beat records▶ FREE ROAMING MODE: Explore the area at your own paceTaking place in an airport that’s been repurposed as an obstacle course for giant monster trucks, Monster Truck Airport Show will test your driving skills unlike anything you’ve seen before! Pick one of the amazing, unbelievably huge trucks available and show that you’ve got what it takes to drive them! This is the ultimate, extreme test for the most proficient drivers! Do you have what it takes to take part and pass it with flying colours?Before you prove your worth as a driver, you will need to familiarize yourself with a varied selection of giant, big-wheel monster trucks. There are sports cars turned into monster trucks, a monster truck pickup, even a monster truck bus!Discover all of them and you may find some surprises too! You will take all of those monster trucks onto the arena and use them to beat speed records, perform amazing stunt tricks, even drive across smaller cars parked around! Who’s going to stop you?Depending on the vehicle of your choosing, you will get multiple missions of varying difficulty to complete. You will have to dodge obstacles, use ramps for long distance jumps, drive over cars & tree logs and more! Don’t take your eyes off the road Perform mind-blowing tricks, test your reflexes, become a master stunt driver!There isn’t much that can compare to the power of a speeding monster truck, but that doesn’t mean you can be reckless! Drive safely and carefully and you will surely make it to the end in one piece. If you go a little too wild and crash though, don’t worry. If you make a mistake along the way you can always use a rewind system to correct it without restarting the level from scratch.
descriptionHTML:
Airport Show is an exclusive stunt driving event and you’ve been invited to take part! Welcome to the high stakes, high-octane driving competition for the fiercest drivers! The biggest monster trucks need only apply!

FEATURES:
▶ UNIQUE STUNT ARENA: Drive around an old airport!
▶ AWESOME MONSTER TRUCKS: Each vehicle handles differently
▶ 70 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE: Drive, do tricks, beat records
▶ FREE ROAMING MODE: Explore the area at your own pace

Taking place in an airport that’s been repurposed as an obstacle course for giant monster trucks, Monster Truck Airport Show will test your driving skills unlike anything you’ve seen before! Pick one of the amazing, unbelievably huge trucks available and show that you’ve got what it takes to drive them! This is the ultimate, extreme test for the most proficient drivers! Do you have what it takes to take part and pass it with flying colours?

Before you prove your worth as a driver, you will need to familiarize yourself with a varied selection of giant, big-wheel monster trucks. There are sports cars turned into monster trucks, a monster truck pickup, even a monster truck bus!

Discover all of them and you may find some surprises too! You will take all of those monster trucks onto the arena and use them to beat speed records, perform amazing stunt tricks, even drive across smaller cars parked around! Who’s going to stop you?

Depending on the vehicle of your choosing, you will get multiple missions of varying difficulty to complete. You will have to dodge obstacles, use ramps for long distance jumps, drive over cars & tree logs and more! Don’t take your eyes off the road Perform mind-blowing tricks, test your reflexes, become a master stunt driver!

There isn’t much that can compare to the power of a speeding monster truck, but that doesn’t mean you can be reckless! Drive safely and carefully and you will surely make it to the end in one piece. If you go a little too wild and crash though, don’t worry. If you make a mistake along the way you can always use a rewind system to correct it without restarting the level from scratch.
developerAddress:
15 Spinnaker Quay
Mount Batten
Plymouth
Devon
PL9 9SA
United Kingdom
summary: Amazing monster trucks, mindblowing tricks for the best!
title: Monster Truck XT Airport Derby

description: Välkommen till Bamses värld! Här kan ni se på film hos Lille Skutt, lyssna på musik hos Bamse eller hälsa på hos Skalman och läsa böcker. Appen är gratis att ladda ned och ni kan prova alla aktiviteter utan kostnad. Ni kan enkelt köpa till filmer, böcker, musik och pyssel i appen. Innehållet som kan köpas finns i Bamsebutiken som skyddas med en barnspärr och koden till ert Google-Konto, så att barn inte köper innehåll utan er tillåtelse. Nytt innehåll kommer att släppas löpande så uppdatera gärna appen kontinuerligt för att få ett större utbud av underhållning. Aktiviteter: • Tecknad film – de klassiska filmerna av Rune Andréasson • Böcker med text och tal • Lek med Bamse – välj en bakgrund och fyll den med figurer och saker • Pannkaksverkstad – laga pannkakor. Varje figur har sin unika fyllning • Musik – härliga Bamsesånger • Klippdockor – klä på och klä om Brumma, Vargen, Bamse och flera andra Bamse och hans vänner välkomnar er till en värld av underhållning och roligheter! Appen kräver WiFi-anslutning när den laddas ned. När innehållet är nedladdat kan det användas utan internetförbindelse. Om Ni har problem med att ladda ned/spela upp film eller annat köpt innehåll från applikationen, kan ni klicka på honungsburken med pilen överst på skärmen och starta nedladdningsprocessen därifrån. Om ni använder samma Google-konto behöver ni inte betala igen för redan köpt innehåll. På samma sätt kan ni ladda ned appen på flera Android-enheter och ni kan ta bort och installera om Bamse-appen. Det kostar inget extra. Om ni laddar ned appen på en ny enhet måste allt köpt innehåll laddas ned igen – utan kostnad. Har du feedback? Hjälp oss gärna att skapa en ännu bättre Bamse-app. Skriv till oss på appservice@egmont.dkMer om oss: Egmont är en ledande mediegrupp i Norden. Vår medievärld innehåller tidningar, böcker, filmer, biografer, interaktiva spel och tv. Egmont publicerar media i över 30 länder, har 6 400 anställda och genererar intäkter som uppgår till 1,4 miljarder euro. Egmont omfattar Skandinaviens största filmbolag, Norges största tidningsutgivare, bokutgivare och kommersiella tv-sändningar och även de största utgivarna av barnmedia i Skandinavien, Tyskland, Polen och Ryssland. Egmont Publishing Digital producerar och ger ut underhållning och läsupplevelser för barn och unga i 30 länder. Produkter, universum och koncept är uppbyggda kring populära varumärken som Kalle Anka, Nalle Puh, Hello Kitty, Disneys Prinsessor, Wendy, My Little Pony, Littlest Pet Shop och många fler. För mer information besök oss på www.egmont.com, www.facebook.com/Barnappar eller www.egmontapps.com
descriptionHTML:
Välkommen till Bamses värld!

Här kan ni se på film hos Lille Skutt, lyssna på musik hos Bamse eller hälsa på hos Skalman och läsa böcker.

Appen är gratis att ladda ned och ni kan prova alla aktiviteter utan kostnad. Ni kan enkelt köpa till filmer, böcker, musik och pyssel i appen. Innehållet som kan köpas finns i Bamsebutiken som skyddas med en barnspärr och koden till ert Google-Konto, så att barn inte köper innehåll utan er tillåtelse.

Nytt innehåll kommer att släppas löpande så uppdatera gärna appen kontinuerligt för att få ett större utbud av underhållning.

Aktiviteter:
• Tecknad film – de klassiska filmerna av Rune Andréasson
• Böcker med text och tal
• Lek med Bamse – välj en bakgrund och fyll den med figurer och saker
• Pannkaksverkstad – laga pannkakor. Varje figur har sin unika fyllning
• Musik – härliga Bamsesånger
• Klippdockor – klä på och klä om Brumma, Vargen, Bamse och flera andra

Bamse och hans vänner välkomnar er till en värld av underhållning och roligheter!

Appen kräver WiFi-anslutning när den laddas ned. När innehållet är nedladdat kan det användas utan internetförbindelse.

Om Ni har problem med att ladda ned/spela upp film eller annat köpt innehåll från applikationen, kan ni klicka på honungsburken med pilen överst på skärmen och starta nedladdningsprocessen därifrån. Om ni använder samma Google-konto behöver ni inte betala igen för redan köpt innehåll. På samma sätt kan ni ladda ned appen på flera Android-enheter och ni kan ta bort och installera om Bamse-appen. Det kostar inget extra. Om ni laddar ned appen på en ny enhet måste allt köpt innehåll laddas ned igen – utan kostnad.

Har du feedback? Hjälp oss gärna att skapa en ännu bättre Bamse-app. Skriv till oss på appservice@egmont.dk

Mer om oss:

Egmont är en ledande mediegrupp i Norden. Vår medievärld innehåller tidningar, böcker, filmer, biografer, interaktiva spel och tv. Egmont publicerar media i över 30 länder, har 6 400 anställda och genererar intäkter som uppgår till 1,4 miljarder euro. Egmont omfattar Skandinaviens största filmbolag, Norges största tidningsutgivare, bokutgivare och kommersiella tv-sändningar och även de största utgivarna av barnmedia i Skandinavien, Tyskland, Polen och Ryssland.

Egmont Publishing Digital producerar och ger ut underhållning och läsupplevelser för barn och unga i 30 länder. Produkter, universum och koncept är uppbyggda kring populära varumärken som Kalle Anka, Nalle Puh, Hello Kitty, Disneys Prinsessor, Wendy, My Little Pony, Littlest Pet Shop och många fler.

För mer information besök oss på www.egmont.com, www.facebook.com/Barnappar eller www.egmontapps.com
summary: Welcome to Bamse's World!
title: Bamse

comments: You see I'm not the only person  who wouldn't recommend this game. Adds constantly and how could you play they game when it's so tricky to drive. I thought it was my bad driving but it seems I'm not the only one who disliked this game.so  please make some improvements. I could drag you through all the bad things but I won't make you suffer. So I will give it sadly a 👎.

The game is ok at least when I get a chance to play it -there are way too many ads every time i click on a level to play an ad shows up even sometimes during when i play an ad shows up. I strongly recommend that you do not install this app
First if all... Its down right BORING! Also there is adds after every single level! Sometimes the adds are weird and innaproprete! I do NOT reccomend this game, download at your own risk😕

I liked the game and all but there were way to many ads. Every level there was a thirty second video playing and some of them were extremely inappropriate. I got a bit impatient waiting for all the ads to end but I liked the game set-up. I think that was a neat idea. I just think it would be better without all the interruptions

I think it should be a bit more realistic and by that I mean more people on the streets; if you crash into someone, that person would come out of their car angry and cars get damaged when you crash into them. Maybe, to add a bit more reality to the game, you could add the money that they pay you to the levels. Apart from that it is an excellent game. However, some people, when they get in a taxi, chat away to the taxi driver.

OK I've told Coco Play enough times that I'm Lucy's 8 year old daughter. This game isn't for kids BECAUSE there's a girl that has a really short skirt!!! ITS INAPPROPRIATE!! THAT'S NOT FOR KIDS LIKE ME!!! The controls are VERY hard!!!! Pleaseeeee fix that problem!!

descriptionHTML:
Taxi Game

Good news! In a few weeks we'll release a big update. Stay tuned for the best taxi sim 2018

You must be a fan of the driving games. We assume that you're crazy about parking games as well. If so, this taxi game is what you need! Try to become a taxi driver in one of the best taxi simulator.
Race your car through the big city traffic, pick up passengers and drive them safely to their destinations.
In your taxi cab you can drive faster than in the bus simulator so be careful! Duty driving is not that easy. Life in the city is crazy, watch out for the people and the traffic.

There are many taxi games in the Google Play store but this one is exceptional. You can driving around the big city, suburbs, construction sites, parks and even the beach. It's crazy how the city lives - people are walking, cars are crossing. Get in your taxi, fasten your seat belts and become a city traffic racer.

Taxi Game features:

- Full 3D large environment
- Smooth controls optimized for taxi sim
- Realistic big city graphics
- Engaging taxi driver missions
- Drive the passengers to their destinations
- Many different routes across the city

Master your driving skills in one of the best taxi games!
summary: Crazy to be a taxi driver? Start as a duty driver in this taxi sim.
title: Taxi Game

comments: I really like this game . It is awsome. I always play this game when I have to cool down and sometime don't  want to do something. Great time killer. The thing that I like the most in this game is that , there are more than 100 levels and that if free of cost. What amazing and challenging game. But there is something that I really don't like  andbi want to warn you while you are downloading this game. The thing is that whenever you had completed a level an advert comes always. And that is really very annoyed for me. Well all over I want to say that it's  a really very good game and I am very gald that I am on 22nd level and soon I will be in in 23rd.

Ok but I'm on level 9 and 8x8 and I just started it yesterday so yes pretty easy. Oh and by the way if u were going to get it just to warn u there's soooooo many adverts when u complete a level (very annoying)☺☺☺😑😑😑🐜🐜🐜Antnoing u get it hahaha!!!🐜🐜🐜
Totally addicted!  This game goes from basic kg tic tac toe to 6 in a row and challenging the higher level u go over 100 levels so worth it!  And Free!!!

If there is to many ads airplane mode is good this is a awesome game but some other stuff are a bit off I still rate 5 stars ... Nice game also it is very cool so ever thing is great u guys who made it are a good creaters nice game so nice thanks it is cool

Great game i like the multiplayer thing and i also like the ranking or the leaderboard what i dont like the most are the ads too many of them but i know you vcant remove them cause u need to earn money but please limit the ads just let the ads show when the player loses Great Game

The game is interactive. Please look seriously into the language mixup. I have chosen English but a lot of things (esp on the exit menu), the language is different. Hope the developer knows the language difference!!!!

description: tom kitty cube crushcat cube crush is a new Tap and pop the cubes game with unique and special game play like never before! your target in the game is to blast the blocks and solve the level puzzle, the more blocks you pop the better boosters you will get that will help to to solve the puzzle and bring down all the toy to blastthe game is challenging, it look easy at start to help you learn it but afterwards you will have the think hard and consider your tactics, we promise you that you will have the best time playing and as you progress you will enjoy it more and more, there is nothing better then solving the puzzle blocks and smashing all the cubes.

description: Be Ben, be an alien, be the hero! Are You Ready?In this free app, you can transform into one of four Ben 10 Aliens, Diamondhead, Heatblast, Stinkfly or Four Arms, each with their own unique facial interactions and character specific animations. Then take on Zombozo and his robots in 360-degree augmented reality action!With Ben 10 Alien Experience you get two apps in one, a super cool face swapper and an action-packed robot blaster. Use your device’s camera and see the transformation take place in front of your very eyes as you become one of Ben Tennyson’s amazing alien forms.Warm things up as Heatblast and experience his fiery powers or chill out as Diamondhead and see icicles appear all around you! Become Stinkfly and shoot out slime balls or smash things up as Four Arms. Take photos and record short videos straight to your device before sharing them with family and friends!The fun doesn’t end once you transform! Take your device and save the day from waves enemies that only you can see. Use your alien’s powers to defend yourself from Zomboso and his robots in augmented reality gameplay. Use your device as a radar to find and destroy endless hordes of enemies in exciting 360-degree action.It’s Hero Time!**********This game is available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch,  German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Arabic, Czech, Norwegian, Portuguese, Turkish and Greek.If you're having any problems, contact us at apps.emea@turner.com. descriptionHTML:
Be Ben, be an alien, be the hero! Are You Ready?

In this free app, you can transform into one of four Ben 10 Aliens, Diamondhead, Heatblast, Stinkfly or Four Arms, each with their own unique facial interactions and character specific animations. Then take on Zombozo and his robots in 360-degree augmented reality action!

With Ben 10 Alien Experience you get two apps in one, a super cool face swapper and an action-packed robot blaster. Use your device’s camera and see the transformation take place in front of your very eyes as you become one of Ben Tennyson’s amazing alien forms.

Warm things up as Heatblast and experience his fiery powers or chill out as Diamondhead and see icicles appear all around you! Become Stinkfly and shoot out slime balls or smash things up as Four Arms. Take photos and record short videos straight to your device before sharing them with family and friends!

The fun doesn’t end once you transform! Take your device and save the day from waves enemies that only you can see. Use your alien’s powers to defend yourself from Zomboso and his robots in augmented reality gameplay. Use your device as a radar to find and destroy endless hordes of enemies in exciting 360-degree action.

It’s Hero Time!

**********

This game is available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Arabic, Czech, Norwegian, Portuguese, Turkish and Greek.

If you're having any problems, contact us at apps.emea@turner.com. Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using. This app may contain ads for Cartoon Network & our partners’ products & services.


**********

This app may contain ads that feature other products, services, shows or offers from Cartoon Network and our partners.

PRIVACY INFORMATION:
Your privacy is important to us at Cartoon Network, a division of Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. This information may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content; serve advertising; perform network communications; manage and improve our products and services; and perform other internal operations of Cartoon Network web sites or online services. Our privacy practices are guided by data privacy laws in the United States. For users residing in the EU or other countries outside the U.S., please note that this app may use persistent identifiers for game management purposes. By downloading this application, you accept our Privacy Policy and End User License Agreement, and you give permission for such uses for all users of your device. The Privacy Policy and End User License Agreement are in addition to any terms, conditions or policies imposed by your wireless carrier and Apple, Inc. Cartoon Network and its affiliates are not responsible for any collection, use, or disclosure of your personal information by Apple or your wireless carrier.

Terms of Use: http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/legal/termsofuse.html
Privacy Policy: http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/legal/privacy/mobile.html

comments: There's absolutely no way you're able to go through all the levels unless you spend money at some point or you just wait out the lives recount. It's a good freemium game, but don't bother redoing levels unless it's to earn more coins for essential upgrades. This game WILL take your money if you let it.

I love the game but .... once hit level 46... seems impossible even with boosts ... I want a game that's NOT trying to get you hooked then have to pay money to get you  to the next level just to play ...up to the 46th level (playing each level 3 times..and having all time consuming upgrades) was very entertaining and awesome... but after 46th level...once again seems impossible... hope I can get 15 thumbs up... one day... or I'll just delete..np

This game is soooo fun!! Its better than Cooking Fever. I love this game!❤ the levels get harder but that's the fun of it. And the food makes me really hungry🍔! But the thing is that after a few days (when i first got the game) it didn't let me play the game, it just stayed at 89 percent. So I got the game again but it still did it😭.

Totally addictive! Love it! I have read quite a few reviews that say it's impossible to play further on without purchasing boosters but thats not true. It gets harder for sure but I'm past level 60 and haven't spent any money on anything. So get the game and enjoy!! But be prepared to lose afternoons and sleep. Super addictive!;)

Great cooking game! I love that all of the upgrades so far have been based on the money I earned and not the premium currency. With hundreds of levels to play, it'll take some time to have to wait for more.   My only issue is I have a ton of money in one city and can't transfer it to another.

This could be a fantastic game. I've gotten to the 3rd restaurant and it's become very obvious that you have to purchase boosters to complete levels. I'm willing to play and replay levels to get money to upgrade, I'm willing to watch ads, but I'm not into getting suckered into thinking I've finally found a decent game I can play for free only to find out that I can only progress if I pay.

Be a top chef and do it all in a cooking fever. Dash around the kitchen baking pizza, grilling tasty burgers, and cooking world-class cuisine. description: Free Moto Racer GP inheriting the traditional racing mode, beside that, we also joined the VR mode. Take you to experience the racing experience from different perspectives!Become a good motorcycle driver, first of all, you should own adventure spirit, and the cool motorcycle is also indispensable!A variety of upgrades and transformations make this motorcycle race amazing!Game Features:◆ We have 10 cool motorcycle models from all over the world;◆ 5 Moto Ares suite, the driver and the car can be replaced suit;◆ Adapt to all devices above Android 4.0;◆ No WiFi, no problem, all game levels support offline games;◆ More games, in a field exciting competition to become the king to dominate the game!◆ Keep upgrading your car, you can become stronger.Gameplay:◆ Three kinds of competitions, regular season, knockout, time-limited game;◆ Winning ways can not only run fast, you can also hit the opponent's car, so that they rollovers;◆ In the curved track, the blind acceleration will only make you over the head, in some sharp corners you have to slow down;◆ Avoid being beyond by opponents, you need to use the rearview mirror to see how far behind the opponent from you.Break through the traditional racing motorcycle games, third-person perspective, to the real people screaming!Come on and be the best motorcycle riders, the free motorcycle GP will give you an incredible gaming experience!
descriptionHTML:
Free Moto Racer GP inheriting the traditional racing mode, beside that, we also joined the VR mode. Take you to experience the racing experience from different perspectives!

Become a good motorcycle driver, first of all, you should own adventure spirit, and the cool motorcycle is also indispensable!

A variety of upgrades and transformations make this motorcycle race amazing!

Game Features:
◆ We have 10 cool motorcycle models from all over the world;
◆ 5 Moto Ares suite, the driver and the car can be replaced suit;
◆ Adapt to all devices above Android 4.0;
◆ No WiFi, no problem, all game levels support offline games;
◆ More games, in a field exciting competition to become the king to dominate the game!
◆ Keep upgrading your car, you can become stronger.

Gameplay:
◆ Three kinds of competitions, regular season, knockout, time-limited game;
◆ Winning ways can not only run fast, you can also hit the opponent's car, so that they rollovers;
◆ In the curved track, the blind acceleration will only make you over the head, in some sharp corners you have to slow down;
◆ Avoid being beyond by opponents, you need to use the rearview mirror to see how far behind the opponent from you.

Break through the traditional racing motorcycle games, third-person perspective, to the real people screaming!

Come on and be the best motorcycle riders, the free motorcycle GP will give you an incredible gaming experience!
summary: Free Moto Racer GP is the most fun motorcycle game on Android!
title: Free Moto Racing GP

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Sonny The Mad Man! Are you ready for adventure and epic fights?

Here are some of the main features of this game :

· High Quality HD Adaptive Graphics
This game is designed to adapt to your mobile phone or tablet's performance capability. You can also customize your graphical expericence by settign the graphics quality to LOW, MEDIUM or HIGH to match the FPS rate to your device.

· Dangerous enemies
Figh a number of dangerous enemies, each with it's special strength and weaknesses!

· Improved and adaptive controls
With the feedback of more than 10000 people I was able to improve the controls for this game and offer 3 different joystick configurations that will suit even the most demanding gamer! Set the Touch Sensitivity option to your desired comfort level and pick your favorite joystick setup from the settings panel!

· Fly around and spread mayhem
Fly trough the city in a jetpack, different helicopters and even a jet fighter!

· Story mode with a ton of missions
Every time you complete a mission, a new one is unlocked to provide you with endless hours of fun!

· Drive around shooting from tanks and missile turrets!
Do you like driving more than flying? All the vehicles featured in this game are controllable, even the tanks! Missile turrets you say? Sure, why not!

Enjoy!

A Game by The Lonely Developer - An Independent Programmer
developerAddress: Calle de la Libertad 187, Madrid, Spain
recentChanges: I have improved the controls with the help of all your feeback, added graphics options for better FPS and more joystick options, also fixed a few minor bugs! Enjoy!
summary: Welcome to Sonny The Mad Man! Are you ready for adventure and epic fights?
title: Sonny The Mad Man

description: Ready to drive big offroad trucks in one of the best 6x6 driving simulator games! Take control of 6x6 offroad trucks (4x4 trucks with more wheels!) in a huge offroad mountain environment: 16 km² area, 30 km of roads!Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver! !! Truck Driver 6x6 Hill Driving contains action packed 20 truck driving missions !!Get right into the driving action and become the 6x6 truck driver, drive some seriously big vehicles in one of the best driving simulators in 6x6 offroad trucks. Experience driving specially modified trucks, with 6x6 all-terrain driving, you can conquer driving anywhere offroad in the most realistic driving simulator game!Explore the massive open world map with your own 6x6 offroad truck, filled with loads exciting places to visit. Beautiful vistas in one of the best truck driving simulators. Like a waterfall cascade and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping places, and more... Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes to very small dirt road up mountains, with a hill climb driving experience waiting for you.Example of missions :- Tow broke down 4x4 trucks offroad- Transport important cargo across the country- Race at speed to get through speed traps- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climbs- Stop and catch all the gangsters with your SUV- Protect your terrain from wolves- Avoid without hitting the boars and barrels- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possible- And a whole load more!!Features :- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, and forests- Realistic 6x6 truck driving simulator- Realistic off-road truck driving physics- High-quality 6x6 trucks and vehicles- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!- Easy to play truck driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.
descriptionHTML:
Ready to drive big offroad trucks in one of the best 6x6 driving simulator games! Take control of 6x6 offroad trucks (4x4 trucks with more wheels!) in a huge offroad mountain environment: 16 km² area, 30 km of roads!
Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver!

!! Truck Driver 6x6 Hill Driving contains action packed 20 truck driving missions !!

Get right into the driving action and become the 6x6 truck driver, drive some seriously big vehicles in one of the best driving simulators in 6x6 offroad trucks. Experience driving specially modified trucks, with 6x6 all-terrain driving, you can conquer driving anywhere offroad in the most realistic driving simulator game!

Explore the massive open world map with your own 6x6 offroad truck, filled with loads exciting places to visit. Beautiful vistas in one of the best truck driving simulators.
Like a waterfall cascade and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping places, and more...
Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes to very small dirt road up mountains, with a hill climb driving experience waiting for you.

Example of missions :
- Tow broke down 4x4 trucks offroad
- Transport important cargo across the country
- Race at speed to get through speed traps
- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climbs
- Stop and catch all the gangsters with your SUV
- Protect your terrain from wolves
- Avoid without hitting the boars and barrels
- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possible
- And a whole load more!!

Features :
- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, and forests
- Realistic 6x6 truck driving simulator
- Realistic off-road truck driving physics
- High-quality 6x6 trucks and vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!
- Easy to play truck driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
descriptionHTML:
Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!

Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:

>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals

>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy

>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses

>LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuff

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
summary: Welcome to a farm where you can play with your own herd in a Horse Stable!
title: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator

comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

It's casual, relaxing and fun. Super cute. And it has 2 huge pluses: first of all it feels rewarding since you actually have a realistic possibility of getting new fluffies; second, you don't have ads shoved in your face every 5 seconds, in fact you pretty much never see them.  Really great at the moment, hope it stays this way. Lots of respect to the Devs for staying away from annoying cash grab techniques.

this game is adorable. the only thing i'm not quite sure about is the rainbow system; what does it do? how does it work? it would be great to have a page that explains the details to those of us who aren't great at working this stuff out. i'd also like to ask why there aren't plushies for these things??? they're so cute! i'd by tons of they were real. anyway, great game, and the little fluffy cubes are the sweetest things and i just want to hug them all.

This game is amazing, a load of fun and very competitive with friends, unfortunately no multiplayer on it.Would love for more Fluffies in the future with different abilities. Also Fluffies you can unlock by doing certain challenges and other stuff. You can also create a level mode where you have challenging levels to complete for coins or Fluffies, and one last thing, you all should have a head to head mode to see who can last the longest going against each other. Those are just some suggestions that I think would make the game even better than it already is.

I love Fluffy Fall so much!! It is SUPER kawaii, fun, fuzzy, and enjoyable. It takes up your time as you try to beat your highscore!! Mine is 45. Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! 😊💕

description: Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.Features•	Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.•	Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.•	Challenging background sound.•	The person with max points will win the game.•	Simple and interesting user interface.•	Invite your family and friends and compete with them.•	Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.
descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
• Simple and interesting user interface.
• Invite your family and friends and compete with them.
• Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.

So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.

Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.

descriptionHTML:
Classic Minesweeper game for your Android (also known as Mines). Exercise your strategic and logical thinking while having fun along the way! The goal is to uncover all cells that are not containing mines.

TIP: Use volume buttons to toggle mode Open cell/Put flag

Main features:
• Online highscores
• Large scrollable and zoomable game area
• Nice, clean and easy to use interface

Paid version is also available. See Minesweeper Professional. Advantages:

• Zoom tuning

description: .لعبة أبو خشم هي لعبة مغامرات. يتحرك اللاعب في عالم مفتوح واسع مليء بالتحدي وذلك في أنحاء مدينة نموذجية مستخدما كل مالديه من وسائل المواصلات سواء كانت الاقدام أم السيارات... في لعبه ابو خشم يقابل اللاعب في ثنايا اللعبة شخصيات مختلفة منها وفي مقدمتها رفيق دربه اللماح الذكي شكمان وبإمكانه أن يتحدث مع هذه الشخصيات ويتفاعل معها. يتعرض اللاعب إلى كثير من المفاجئات والتحديات ويستعين بما لديه من إمكانيات للتعامل معها.لعبة ابو خشم بإمكان اللاعب تملك ما يريد في المدينة من عقار ومحلات تجارية ومنازل ونحو ذلك، وسوف يضطر إلى الدخول في معارك خطرة مع أعدائه مستفيدا من خبراته وإمكانياته التي بناها على طول اللعبة وعرضها.من مميزات اللعبة ابو خشمإمكانية امتلاك المتاجرعالم مفتوحمهارات مختلفة، تخدم جانب تقمص الأدوار “RPG”إمكانية شراءساعد ابو خشم على تجاوزالعقبات و تجاوز الصحراء المفزعة و الوصول إلى راية النهاية بسلام، وحاول جمع أكبر عدد ممكن من العناصرالذهبية الموجودة على المسار، كما يمكنك محاولة أداء بعض الحركات الرائعة. لكن احذر وأنت تقوم بالقفز! على ابو خشم أن يصل إلى نهاية السباق سالماً وبدون أية إصابة من أجل الإنتقال إلى المستوى التاليإن أبو خشم Abo Khashem ، هو اسم لعبة يتخذ فيها اللاعب دورا كوميديا، وتدور قصتها حول شخصية تستيقظ في وسط الصحراء المجهولة في حالة فقد تام للذاكرة. حيث يقوم بمحاولة فهم ما جرى له من خلال جمع أكبر كمية ممكنة من المعلومات مما يقع حوله. يوفق اللاعب بشراكة مع رفيق دربه الضب شكمان، حيث يتوجب عليهما أن يكشفا خيوط مؤامرة ضخمة تنطوي على شبكة ماكرة من الأسرار والألغاز. وفي هذا الطريق الشاق لكشف هذه المؤامرة
summary: Game Abu Khashm fun
title: لعبة ابو خشم الممتعة

descriptionHTML:
The year is 3666. The Earth's Empire extends over hundreds of worlds. Peace is kept by the mighty star fleet and the secret Order of the Keepers. You are in command of a strong team of Keepers and mercenaries tasked to fight invaders and recover fragments of a powerful weapon scattered across the galaxy.

Galaxy Rangers is a brand new online strategy game that drops you in the heat of battle and let’s you decide on combat tactics and battle formations. Build a powerful army with hundreds of units and dive into the heat of battle!

FEATURES:
● TACTICS AND FORMATIONS - Devise unique tactics and create destructive combat formations.
● ACTION-PACKED BATTLES - Watch your tactics play out and trigger special skills in intense battles.

comments: Awesome game! Love the art, love the music, love the style, and the gameplay is actually challenging enough to hold my attention but not enough to be irritating. Perfect difficulty. Not to mention the colorblind mode actually works. I know this is receiving a lot of criticism, but I love the option you guys gave with ads and how well you executed it, that was a very nice touch. You really outdid yourselves with this one!

A very decent small game. I don't know what other people are complaining about but you can play the game without paying. The music is nice the graphics is nice it's easy to play. I hope there more levels in the future as this is such a fun game. Very nice one from the team at noodlecake Studios. Kudos my n*****

This title should be moved in the puzzle category in my opinion! Charming story with beautiful low-polygon graphics... Etc! Nevertheless, the game is very short to complete... If, you are not interested in completing the game achievements! There are not enough worlds and levels (right now) and I expect new ones in future updates... Eh! I would certainly convince more mobile gamers to purchase the full game (with unlimited lives and no ads) at 3.99$ CDN. Regardless, I purchased the full version of this game to support one of my favourite Canadian gaming app developer on the Google Play store... 👍😉
No viable instruction, very "money-centric", can't turn off sound effects for quiet play, just the music. Overall, a disappointing waste of time. Uninstalled.
The lives rate behind a paywall is a joke.  Nothing but a money grab.  I will be removing the game

Really fun game, but once you've got a couple colors going, it doesn't like to click the changer buttons. It also doesn't like when you click the buttons while you're moving. Lots of potential here (Currently at 1000 downloads, so I feel like it's still working out the kinks)

description: Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!Featuring:• Exploration of an ancient civilization• Crafting and creative building• Tribal life simulation games• Exotic materials to mine• Lots of free craft items to play with• Amazing blocky graphics• Animal pets to play withOne of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
descriptionHTML:
Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!

Featuring:
• Exploration of an ancient civilization
• Crafting and creative building
• Tribal life simulation games
• Exotic materials to mine
• Lots of free craft items to play with
• Amazing blocky graphics
• Animal pets to play with

One of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.

This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.

There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?

Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Creative crafting and exploration! Mine blocks, craft an Aztec city by hand!
title: Aztec Craft: Ancient Blocky City Building Games 3D

description: How exciting! Kiki is going shopping with Mama Panda! It means the freedom to explore, only if he can stay out of trouble! See the problems he will run into! Perhaps, you can give him a big hand!Fun features:- Easy concepts with child-friendly gameplay- 4 independent scenes with fun interactions- Silly and entertaining animations!With freedom comes responsibility. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers, and they are divided into two groups by age, the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6. descriptionHTML:
How exciting! Kiki is going shopping with Mama Panda! It means the freedom to explore, only if he can stay out of trouble! See the problems he will run into! Perhaps, you can give him a big hand!

Fun features:
- Easy concepts with child-friendly gameplay
- 4 independent scenes with fun interactions
- Silly and entertaining animations!

With freedom comes responsibility. Our goal is to bring safety awarenesses to children. They will relate safety tips to the situations they see and catch all the poor behaviors acted out by our silly panda Kiki. Maybe they will pay more attention to safety the next time they go out, too!

-- -- --

Design concepts:
We focus on inspirational learning
We focus on skill-building
We focus on bringing fun contents to our young audience
Take the baby bus for an unique learning experience!

The series introduction:
BabyBus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers, and they are divided into two groups by age, the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6.

The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. The applications are aimed at the comprehensive and the analytic development in preschoolers.

Tips: In the search bar, enter "BabyBus" to find all of our products.

What, did he just ask you to prom?! Are you in love? Glam up at the spa, add a touch of makeup and BAM - you look HOT! Dance the night away & have a ball - you only go to high school once, after all. description: Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.- Different sections of roads.- Simple logic.- Simple and intuitive controls.- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.- Does not contain purchases within the application.- Hours of fun.- No annoying ads.- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.- Video game totally free.- You do not need the Internet.- It takes up little space.- You can train the mind.Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *Do not forget to vote, rate and / or comment on the Google Play Store in order to improve (suggestions, graphic errors, translation errors, improvements, suggestions ...)
descriptionHTML:
Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.

This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.

Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.

It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.

Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:
- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.
- Different sections of roads.
- Simple logic.
- Simple and intuitive controls.
- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.
- Does not contain purchases within the application.
- Hours of fun.
- No annoying ads.
- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.
- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.
- Video game totally free.
- You do not need the Internet.
- It takes up little space.
- You can train the mind.

Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.

description: Take part in one of the BattleMinibots armoured car shows – spectacular robots fighting games of armoured car and robot warriors radio-guided vehicles. Always dreamed of creating your own indestructible battle cars robot and building a team to take part in the death racing show? With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:ExcabotDrillbotSmile minibombSawbotNailthrower, and other machines for car battle!Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Create your own armoured car minibot in the garage and upgrade its properties to make it to the try-out and become a member of the mech robot wars League!

Enjoy watching steel robot fighting BattleBots and armoured car Robot Wars shows? Always dreamed of creating your own indestructible battle cars robot and building a team to take part in the death racing show? With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!

Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!

Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:
Excabot
Drillbot
Smile minibomb
Sawbot
Nailthrower, and other machines for car battle!

Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Get improving weapons (flame-thrower, magnets, taser, saws etc), armour to protect minibot’s body. Find the best equipment for the minibot and create your own destruction machine. There are new minibots for your collection!

Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. Earn experience points in robots fighting games and get access to minibot customization – new armour, weapons and styles for more breathtaking car wars game.

And remember: the more achievements you unlock, the better, as only the most persistent players will join the mech robot wars League. Let the car wars game start!
Activate your VIP-status, to unlock more game abilities.

Robot warriors war: be #1 in our worldwide leaderboard!

Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots is:

15+ robot warrior and super mechs with unique fighting mechanics, for extreme machines games
Personalization with the help of armour and weapons
Mighty iron warriors and thrilling robots vs robots PvP battle arena fights.

Breathtaking robots vs robots fights are waiting for you. Choose machines for a steel robot fighting and go to the battle arena!

comments: If you like 🍬 Crush on Facebook? Then you will like this game even better. The graphics are cute and the 🐟 give you occasional hints as to what will make them super happy. And then you have that "Aha" moment. There it is.  The trap is set. Lol you are not continuing to play because it is addictive. You play in order to collect coins so you can buy stuff to make the little fish happy. 💘 the graphics kind of a little like an underwater Farmville with the plants 🐟 and decorations you can get fort your aquarium. I do play with 🎶 turned off. Cute game so far.        Graphics make it better than Candy Crush.

With an easy guide, on 'How to play'. Once you get going its great fun. Dare I say quite addictive. Fantastic animations. Amazing back ground music. Plus, no app freezes either.  Its an 'A☆' from me at least.  Only, what would be a great idea. Is all the piggy bank jewels you build up, should be awarded for your hard efforts. Should not have to buy them back.  Only purchase jewels when desperate.

Great game but would love it more if it kept track of when you bought something . Like a little quantity number in the corner after you purchase a fish or decorations. Hard to save up to buy things for guests, sucks when you buy something you already have when trying to complete a task. Other then that it's a great game lol I enjoy playing it.

Great game. Challenging, fun, and addictive lol. I'm 32 and play this often so it's not just for kids . Give it a try it's very satisfying . Just wished you could add friends ... People that play whom you may not know so we all could help each other. That would make it more interactive and a lot more fun. No one I know plays so it would have to be other fellow fishermen 😉

Fantastic game! It's great fun decorating the aqariums and the game board is very clear. The recent move of the boosters to the right hand side of the screen was a VERY bad decision, as I have accidentally used them when my hand has brushed against them - this has happened many times already. A good addition would be a marker indicating a purchased item.

Because you only get 5 lives and you make some levels with too few moves. It would be nice if you could interact more with your fish and tanks. The whole point of beating levels is to build up your tanks...but you can't do anything with them while waiting for lives. It would be a fantastic game if there was more to do within the tanks!
description: Never Fishdomed before? Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of match-3 fun with Fishdom, an all-new free game! Try challenging and fun match-3 gameplay with unique puzzles as you decorate aquariums to create cozy homes for lovely talking fish. Feed them, play with them, and watch them interact with each other. Hey, your finned friends are waiting for you, so dive in now and enjoy this amazing underwater adventure! Features:● Unique gameplay: swap and match pieces, design and decorate aquariums, play with and take care of fish—all in one puzzle game!● Play hundreds of challenging and fun match-3 levels● Compete with other players to develop your aquarium even faster● Explore an exciting aquatic world with funny talking 3D fish that each have their own personality● Liven up fish tanks with breathtaking underwater decor● Grab your scuba mask and enjoy amazing aquarium graphics● It’s a blast for everyone: share your Fishdom mania with your Facebook friends!● No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play Please note that Fishdom is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Fishdom? Learn more: Facebook: facebook.com/Fishdom Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fishdom_mobile/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FishdomOfficial Questions? comments: I love  this   game Still loving the game. Just wanted to put this out there. It would be cool if you could make it to were you could put different designs on the cars like pant the middle the front and rear different colors kinda like the Nascar games. Just wanted to put that out there. But I there way the game still rocks. An for the ppl that thinks it sucks they must not like racing because I've looked at all the round track games and this one is the best of all. Ur biggest fan.

Super fun needs minor improvements Actually very fun but could use a speedometer calibration, the cars go from 215 mph and shoot way down to 170 in the corners of the first track, the speed seems too fast for what the cars are actually doing.. It seems a little stretched but that's all. and sound improvements for the cars ... Other than that it's legit

Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

Needs lots of improvement......... 1. Improve graphics quality like extreme car racing . It will improve the game.  2. Increase the number of opponents in the race.  3. Seriously I don't believe that you added 400 laps race , I think it will be better to race rookies cup which give you 1000 dollar games in just 5 lap.     And you are providing 3000 game dollar for 400 laps . I think you should decrease the 400 laps to 100 or 60 laps it will be a better choice. 4. You have added pit lane in the game so provide a pit stop in the game also .

Great Game but can they add something! Add in cautions, working pit Stalls with tire ware and fuel usage, and tire air pressure adjustment settings so we do get as loose as we do. If you do I will make a YouTube Series about the game and keep this good review!

If possible need there needs to be another look at the position of your car during the race. Ice noticed mulitple times that once i get to first place, i win in first but when i go ro collect thw reward cash it always says seventh or eighth place.. its really irking.  Please fix. Otherwise i do enjoy the game
description: Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!RACE MODES :Multiplayer - Race head to head against other playersRegulation  - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizesLadder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game CenterPractice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trimCARS:Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!EXPERIENCE THE SPEEDFeel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money. ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACINGBeat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.MULTIPLE TRACKS4 unique tracks to unlock.REAL CRASH PHYSICSPersistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCARDesign your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAREngine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.SETUP YOUR STOCK CARAllows you to adjust your car for race trim.REAL SIMULATIONVisually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.RUBBER-BANDING ASSISTHelps gets you back into the race quicker.EARN IN-GAME CASHBased on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.Drivers start your engines!
descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

description: Jaramba Förskola är en version av Sveriges största app för små barn – Jaramba – särskilt framtagen för Sveriges förskoleverksamheter. Genom appen får pedagoger och förskolebarn tillgång till massor av Jarambas material, nu sorterat och framtaget med läroplanen för förskolan i åtanke!Jaramba Förskolas navigering är speciellt framtagen för pedagoger utan att göra det svårt för barnen att ta del av materialet på egen hand. Under ämnen som språk, matematik, naturkunskap och värdegrund hittar ni övningar för stavning, räkning, färg och form och så klart hur man är en bra kompis. I Jaramba Förskola har vi samarbetat med en mängd leverantörer som Natur & Kultur, Piratförlaget och Hatten Förlag i ett försök att samla material som uppmuntrar barn till att lära sig, förstå och diskutera. Ta hjälp av massor av karaktärer som Babblarna, Svea och Pino för att engagera era förskolebarn!Hur fungerar Jaramba Förskola?• Jaramba Förskola ger obegränsad tillgång till innehåll som motsvarar hundratals fristående appar• Nya spel, filmer, upplästa böcker och annat roligt läggs till varje månad i en aldrig sinande ström av nytt material• Det speciellt framtagna gränssnittet riktar sig till dig som pedagog för att du enkelt ska kunna förbereda, eller spontant starta, en lärorik stund med barnen• Använd ett abonnemang för en avdelning på upp till 20 barn• Styr vad barnen fokuserar på med Jaramba Förskolas fokuslås• Jaramba Förskola streamar sitt innehåll direkt på en Android-enhet, så appen upptar aldrig onödigt utrymme.Då Jaramba förskola är avsedd för bruk i förskoleverksamhet kommer vi till en början att administrera användarkonton genom intresseanmälan på https://jaramba.se/forskolaKontakta Jaramba online för att komma igång med konto för din förskola idag!Integritetspolicy: https://www.jaramba.se/policy/Användarvillkor: https://www.jaramba.se/villkor/
descriptionHTML:
Jaramba Förskola är en version av Sveriges största app för små barn – Jaramba – särskilt framtagen för Sveriges förskoleverksamheter. Genom appen får pedagoger och förskolebarn tillgång till massor av Jarambas material, nu sorterat och framtaget med läroplanen för förskolan i åtanke!

Jaramba Förskolas navigering är speciellt framtagen för pedagoger utan att göra det svårt för barnen att ta del av materialet på egen hand. Under ämnen som språk, matematik, naturkunskap och värdegrund hittar ni övningar för stavning, räkning, färg och form och så klart hur man är en bra kompis.
I Jaramba Förskola har vi samarbetat med en mängd leverantörer som Natur & Kultur, Piratförlaget och Hatten Förlag i ett försök att samla material som uppmuntrar barn till att lära sig, förstå och diskutera. Ta hjälp av massor av karaktärer som Babblarna, Svea och Pino för att engagera era förskolebarn!

Hur fungerar Jaramba Förskola?

• Jaramba Förskola ger obegränsad tillgång till innehåll som motsvarar hundratals fristående appar
• Nya spel, filmer, upplästa böcker och annat roligt läggs till varje månad i en aldrig sinande ström av nytt material
• Det speciellt framtagna gränssnittet riktar sig till dig som pedagog för att du enkelt ska kunna förbereda, eller spontant starta, en lärorik stund med barnen
• Använd ett abonnemang för en avdelning på upp till 20 barn
• Styr vad barnen fokuserar på med Jaramba Förskolas fokuslås
• Jaramba Förskola streamar sitt innehåll direkt på en Android-enhet, så appen upptar aldrig onödigt utrymme.

Då Jaramba förskola är avsedd för bruk i förskoleverksamhet kommer vi till en början att administrera användarkonton genom intresseanmälan på https://jaramba.se/forskola
Kontakta Jaramba online för att komma igång med konto för din förskola idag!

Integritetspolicy: https://www.jaramba.se/policy/
Användarvillkor: https://www.jaramba.se/villkor/

comments: It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.if you could just make it possible to win more often I'd play it more, plus give more bombs would REALLY HELP.

It's fine up to a point. The higher the level after 300+ it becomes too difficult and it forces you to spend money, which isn't that much of an issue till you see the price of the items, refuse to spend any money as it's blatant greed.  Probably uninstall if it continues like this

On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

The scene at the end of the level is annoying and takes 5 seconds to play out. Then you have to wait for it to load back to show your stars getting in your chest and your coins. It would be better if it just proceeded to the next level saving about 30 seconds. All that to say, it's an addicting game.

I really enjoyed it up until I got to like level 118. The only way I could figure out the pass that level was to use the things at the bottom of the screen or the things the page where you choose what you want to put in there in advance. But if you don't buy extra coins then you can't either had moves or get anything that will help you along. Not to mention that 100 coins per item is a lot of money. When you charge $2 450 coins. I'm taking this game off my apps.

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you’re ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that’s why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you’re not scared, and you’re ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn’t made or supported by Mojang. Minecraft and Minecraft Pocket Edition are official trademarks of Mojang AB. The developers of this MCPE map don’t cooperate with Mojang. This application fully adheres to the terms set up by Mojang AB. More info at https://account.mojang.com/terms.

descriptionHTML:

Start your babysitting adventures and become the best panda nanny! Give panda Lu a shower in the rain or with an elephant. Prepare food and find out what she likes the most. descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
