description: Looking for Amazing Spider Super Hero Time? Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is the game for you. A US Army Super Spider Hero becomes an Amazing Spider Super Hero Time in this superhero game. Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is going to fulfill all you superhero needs.Background story of this superhero game:A US Army superhero has been moved from bounty hunting situation in a city where monster shooting for monster killing was required. The monster Killer / monster shooter has now been brought to bounty hunting situation in a freezing jungle where monster shooting for monster killing is required to save the jungle from the monsters.What is this SuperHero Game all about:This bounty hunting game depicts monster shooting and monster killing by an army soldier. This game has different monster hunting objectives. Each level in this spider game has an interesting elimination objective for the monster killer. There are 2 modes for the monster killer each mode having different levels for monster shooter in this monster game. More modes may be added to this spider game in future. Your mission in this spider game as a monster shooter is to do monster shooting and monster killing to save the jungle from the monsters.How to play this Monster Killer Game of Monster Hunting?You will be provided with different skills for monster hunting to keep yourself safe from the monsters. Use the following skills as forest hunter:1. Set your direction in the line with the target monster.2. Aim well and try to hit accurately to finish the monster in one hit.3. Touch the attack button to eliminate the target monster.4. As this forest hunter game has different levels so complete the objective set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this hunting game.5. Once you have cleared a level in this forest hunter game, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this monster game.Why play this forest hunter by Kool Games?You are surely going to love this hunting game over the others due to following salient features:1. Totally Free: This monster game is totally free!2. Delightful graphics: This hunt game has awesome graphics. The graphics are high quality as well as very smooth so you are going to have your best gaming experience in this great game.3. Entertaining music: This hunting game has a very entertaining music!.4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this monster game are very realistic and they keep you fully engaged in this killer game.5. Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this spider game as the aim is to save the jungle from the monsters.6. Realistic Missions: The mission associated with each level of this killer game is very realistic and it throws you in the real world while keeping you fully involved. Each mission in this spider game is time bound with a specific elimination target of monsters to keep you focused on the job at hand.7. Player Feedback: Kool Games is always looking forward to your feedback on this US hunter game and try our best to make your gaming experience more and more interesting.Who should play this monster game?Anybody who wants a challenge to keep himself safe from the monsters should play this game and establish the basic skills in the simulating environment mapping to the real world. Everyone else looking for endless hunt of monsters is also welcome to play this killer game.When to play this US hunter game?This game can be played at any time during the day or during the night. You are at office or at home, wherever you are free for monster hunting, just pull out your mobile and enjoy playing this killer game.Kindly do not forget to provide the rating for this hunt game as per your hunting game experience and you can also suggest improvements in your feedback/ review comments of this game.Enjoy the FOREST HUNTER game.
descriptionHTML:
Looking for Amazing Spider Super Hero Time? Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is the game for you. A US Army Super Spider Hero becomes an Amazing Spider Super Hero Time in this superhero game. Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time by Kool Games is going to fulfill all you superhero needs.

Background story of this superhero game:

A US Army superhero has been moved from bounty hunting situation in a city where monster shooting for monster killing was required. The monster Killer / monster shooter has now been brought to bounty hunting situation in a freezing jungle where monster shooting for monster killing is required to save the jungle from the monsters.

What is this SuperHero Game all about:

This bounty hunting game depicts monster shooting and monster killing by an army soldier. This game has different monster hunting objectives. Each level in this spider game has an interesting elimination objective for the monster killer. There are 2 modes for the monster killer each mode having different levels for monster shooter in this monster game. More modes may be added to this spider game in future. Your mission in this spider game as a monster shooter is to do monster shooting and monster killing to save the jungle from the monsters.

How to play this Monster Killer Game of Monster Hunting?

You will be provided with different skills for monster hunting to keep yourself safe from the monsters. Use the following skills as forest hunter:

1. Set your direction in the line with the target monster.

2. Aim well and try to hit accurately to finish the monster in one hit.

3. Touch the attack button to eliminate the target monster.

4. As this forest hunter game has different levels so complete the objective set for a certain level to successfully unlock next level of this hunting game.

5. Once you have cleared a level in this forest hunter game, you can always come back and give it another shot to better your previous mission accomplishment time in this monster game.

Why play this forest hunter by Kool Games?

You are surely going to love this hunting game over the others due to following salient features:

1. Totally Free: This monster game is totally free!

2. Delightful graphics: This hunt game has awesome graphics. The graphics are high quality as well as very smooth so you are going to have your best gaming experience in this great game.

3. Entertaining music: This hunting game has a very entertaining music!.

4. Very realistic sound effects: The sound effects in this monster game are very realistic and they keep you fully engaged in this killer game.

5. Top Quality Fun: Its great fun to play this spider game as the aim is to save the jungle from the monsters.

6. Realistic Missions: The mission associated with each level of this killer game is very realistic and it throws you in the real world while keeping you fully involved. Each mission in this spider game is time bound with a specific elimination target of monsters to keep you focused on the job at hand.

7. Player Feedback: Kool Games is always looking forward to your feedback on this US hunter game and try our best to make your gaming experience more and more interesting.

Who should play this monster game?

Anybody who wants a challenge to keep himself safe from the monsters should play this game and establish the basic skills in the simulating environment mapping to the real world. Everyone else looking for endless hunt of monsters is also welcome to play this killer game.

When to play this US hunter game?

This game can be played at any time during the day or during the night. You are at office or at home, wherever you are free for monster hunting, just pull out your mobile and enjoy playing this killer game.

Kindly do not forget to provide the rating for this hunt game as per your hunting game experience and you can also suggest improvements in your feedback/ review comments of this game.

Enjoy the FOREST HUNTER game.
summary: Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time is the best Super Spider Hero
title: Super Spider Hero: Amazing Spider Super Hero Time

comments: Amazing game buuuuut... Sometimes after I exit the fashion show, the game just pauses while loading... Also, another update you guys can make is to make a save button or make the game automatically save our progress because if you exit the game, all of the items you unlocked by watching ads are loaded again and nobody feels like watching the ads again to unlock items they already unlocked. Great game though!🦄🐎

Very cute!  It has lots of fun things to do.  I love having the ability to customize my pony.  My main issue with this app is that it doesn't save anything.  I'm tired of some outfits being free one day and locked the next.  Other than that, its fairly good!

I like this game but... Every time I play for about 5 minutes and I try to press something then it won't load. So then I have to press my phone's home button then I start the app all over again. If this was fixed then I would give this app 5 stars. But this always bothers me to get rid of my pony's outfit. This is a fun game overall.

This is a fun and interesting game and it has good illustrations but I have two suggestions. First, save the outfits and makeup when you exit the game because it gets annoying to redo it every time I open the app. Second, make the races longer and more complicated.

Coco play games used to be really good with barely no ads like Ava the 3d doll. Now, look what happened. This game has stacks of ads that has NO X BUTTON causing me to press ◀ every time they show up.

This is supposed to be a kids game. All u see every 1min even if u dont click anything are violent ads. Ad infested game. Played for 5mins saw 20 violent ads. Deleted on the 6mins. All 4 and 5 star reviews are paid to write reviewers. Read those with 1or2 stars and u get what i mean.

description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.Features:▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.

Features:
▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!
▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!
▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking
▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!
▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!

Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.

Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.

Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!

comments: It's okay and the graphics are really nice, the sound effects are good but ultimately, you play and play and play and play and still not got to the other towns. I've got to about the 7th and had enough of trying to get further and not progressing much. It's okay for a few days but after that, and like someone else has mentioned about the ads, too many to get little rewards

This is an idle game with effort and pretty fun writing, with a lot of ways to feel rewarded without cracking your wallet. It's obviously not the driving game but if you want an idle/clicker, you can't really go wrong with this one. The character diversity is a genuine highlight more games could take a note from.

Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. 👌👍❤

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

description: Snow sledge is snowmobile mountain racing with 3D hill climb race tracks! Motor sledge racing brings you a mix of csr classic enduro race style and snocross racing. A snowmobile, also known as a winter sled is a vehicle designed for winter travel on snow. Sledge Racing Mountain Slide - Winter Sport is all new snow bus race on snow tracks similar to the dirt tracks on which motocross ski racing shooter takes place. Start your engine and be that sports bike stunt rider you always wanted to be in this chilly snow Sledge Racing Mountain Slide - Winter Sport. Get rid of ordinary cars, trucks parking and other death race games on streets and city locations. You will love riding these snow board Atv snowmobile on frozen trails along with crazy racing rivals. Drive snow patrol ski racing in hill climb race mountains area with chilly snow and steep landsliding areas. Become a pro snowmobile racing champion with freestyle offroad drive on sledge by winning this death race. Enjoy one of first kind ski ride sledge with challenging missions and cliff jumping on snow hill tracks.Snowmobile Mountain Slide Features :»Extreme Snow board Snowmobile racing	»Real physics and dynamic control with smooth touch and drag»Ultimate frozen trails for sledge race»Stunning 3D snow environment & icy cold mountains»Easy and intuitive controls»Superb background music to enhance your gaming experience»10 challenging sledge action enduro race snow tracks Get ready to experience an adventurous and thrilling motocross hill climb snow bike riding game in this cliff jumping Sledge Racing Mountain Slide - Winter Sport. Snow plow were originally intended as a winter utility vehicle or sledge that could be used in chilly snow where motor vehicles could not go so grab your snowmobile to challenge the furious weather conditions by beating the ski racing time and racing rivals in order to become snow runner. Ride your sports bike on icy enduro race tracks, drive your sledge fast to climb dangerous mountains and for cliff jumping. Rush your snow patrol sleigh to the finish line smashing on the slippery hill race track. Go for offroad Atv snowmobile racing and steer your winter sled to win and earn cash reward for unlocking other quad bike crash simulator on the road while stunting around while ice is falling on the ground! Launch off monster jumps, speed through deep valleys, and power up your sleigh for hill climb race like you've never seen before in many previous enduro race. All levels are designed special operations in mind, to make this Sledge Racing Mountain Slide - Winter Sport game fun for players. Ride your supercharged snow plow on the icy terrain, perform extreme action stunts, cliff jumping or tricks to win this dangerous snowy mountain snowman death race against furious snowmobile racing rivals. Feel the passion & thrill of snowmobile race tracks on sledge in winter sled. Operate sledge snow plow and drive these off-road mountain sports bike out in cold weather and beat your crazy ski racing rivals. Driving snow patrol sled on icy ramps in extreme weather with heavy snowfall is challenging. So test your driving skills and become the Atv snowmobile sledge champion stuntmen driver in this ultimate sleigh off road racing.“Speed-driven quad bike crash simulator adventure, ideal for off road racing addicts!” So download this amazing snow sledge game for extreme fun with ice bashing snow patrol death race offroad drive.

description: electric screen prank app is a super fun prank game. Prank your friends and family with this free game. Making jokes with this game is so simple; for example leave your mobile or tablet unlocked and when somebody touches the screen shall believe the screen creates electricity when is touched. The electricity effects and sounds simulate a electric shock.Have into account that this free app is just a game that simulates a electric screen shock. It is designed to joke with your friends and family. Kids and children also can have so much fun with this app. Besides the electric screen prank, the app also includes a mini game, which is used to obtain coins and unlock new lightning effects colors.The game consists of several parts: the electric screen prank game, the mini game Potty vs Bugs and the free coins virtual store. At the beginning the only available electric lightning color is the blue one. Other colors as red, yellow and green have to been unlocked. In order to do so the user needs to collect coins. Coins can be collected in several ways: playing the mini game Potty vs Bugs, sharing on social networks (Facebook, Twitter or Google Plus) or watching rewarded videos. Each video the user watches gives +50 coins. If the player shares on any social network of the mentioned above also gets 50 coins but only for the first time that he/she shares.The free mini game included is Potty vs Bugs, an adventures platformer game based on a story of a potato, which has to pass 80 levels over 4 worlds to complete his mission. The game is really addictive and fun. The player will discover plenty of challenging levels, secret bricks full of rewards, hidden underground scenarios. Jump, run, swim, shoot fire balls and take a balloon to fly to the sky. There are plenty of different bugs awaiting the potato arrival. Many insects all over the 4 worlds, 8 final bosses in their respective castles. How to play this game is an easy task: move right or left, use the downward arrow of the game pad control to duck. Ducking on some tubes can make you go down through the pipes and find secret underground levels. Use the rightmost button to jump, and the one right on its left side to run and shoot fire balls. To run, the player has to keep the run button pressed while it moves right or left. Jumping is a bit tricky, since it depends on how long the user keeps the jump button pressed. As said before, the mini game is a great way of collecting coins to unlock new electric lightning color. Every level on the game is plenty of coins, some of them can be seen as part of the scenario, other are hidden on visible bricks and blocks, and the player can also find coins in secret blocks. The sky levels are a bonus to add more coins to the score of the game, which are used later to provide new content of the electric screen part. Remember that to store the coins collected in a level, the user has to finish that level.The design of the game is made thinking on create a environment to enjoy the prank app electric screen and have fun playing the mini game Potty vs Bugs, all this joint to have a final goal, unlocking the strobe flash light effect. This shall be available once the user collects 2500 coins, then the user can have the electric lightning visual effect and the electric shock sound effect along with the strobe flashlight effect. Have into account that in order to enjoy of such effect your mobile device should have flashlight.

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

I don't think levels are nessecary. Basically, they don't exactly apply to anything so put them in 'task list' based on days you need to do. Also,controls and graphics are pretty good but try to polish them a bit. It needs some work. Please make this more interesting.

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics
Too many ads! Every time I go to the next level I have to wait for ages and by the time its loaded I am bored! Maybe make the levels last longer? Other than that its OK!
description: This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun! Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You’re the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids’ breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom’s daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine, and make your day much more difficult! The completion of every level increases the variety and difficulty of tasks.The life of a mom is demanding. Don’t let your family down! Be a SUPERMOM for your family!Virtual Mom Happy Family 3D Features:• High Quality 3D Graphics• Awesome Sounds for Maximum Fun! • Smooth and Easy Controls• Addictive Game Play• Super Cool House Environment• Family Woman Life Simulation• Daily Household Tasks Based Missions to Complete

description: Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft! Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper! Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design  items to make the most unique interior design ever!Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant! Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala! Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a  french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!Craft & BuildSimply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!Play MinigamesPlay minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you! Meet the peopleUse internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend! Explore the infinite worldYou can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!Become an interior and exterior designerUse one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design! Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  🤗😠👍

Used to be better It nags you to death about installing Google Games, as if it won't run right without it (runs fine). Then if you install it it nags you to login. All this so that you can do stuff I have no interest in, like posting your scores online.  Allow us to turn off the nagging, please. This is the best bowling app I've seen, which is a sad statement about the quality of bowling apps. Unrealistic physics for the pin action that make it impossible to ever do a split. No way to impart a spin on the ball.

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.

I've been playing this game for 2 years now and I love it. The screen doesn't bounce around and jerk like some of the other games, or flash brite colors at you. Just line your ball up with your arrows just like real bowling. I got 7 strikes in a row one time.🐶🐶🐶

Dinosaur World Craft Exploration:Lite - an exciting game in prehistoric cubic universe where you build, construct, create & craft - using blocks - in world! Dinosaurs (t-rex [tyrannosaurus], triceratops etc.] all around you! This lite pocket mine blocky craft game, inspired by the popular cube & voxel based pocket edition creative games, lets you craft dino world! No dragons and no survival - just prehistoric reptiles! Teenage boys and girls are welcome! Craft & build a perfect cube dinosaurs world! Exploration of world is here! Construct anything you want! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube dino world.Craft, and explore! Exploration of randomly generated cube prehistoric worlds, islands. Build and create amazing & perfect things from the simplest of homes to the grandest constructions! Start the adventure with “Dino Jurassic Craft Exploration”! This game will bring you only joy and relax! No dragons and survival world craft mode. Just cube jurassic craft world/island and your infinite creativity! Very quick and easy. All for free! This pocket edition (exploration) game contains: block placing, cube world, real time world craft generation. Build a dinosaur world!Craft & Explore the cube world! In this incredible and totally free game you can destroy all the blocks, collect resources, survive and build beautiful & perfect Buildings. This pocket edition game (PE) contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world/Island! High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, High FPS, without compromise! So plunge into the fantastic world of ‘Dino Jurassic Craft: Exploration & Evolution’ - with new cube worlds and adventures! Place blocks / cubes move voxels, dig and mine! Go beyond your wildest dreams, make your own cube jurassic world, mine, castle or city! Great game for adults! And teens! Transform the surface in a 3D environment in Jurassic Jungle! Build shelter, fight, grow and use blocky craft. The only limit is your imagination! Start a cube world craft!

THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

description: Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
descriptionHTML:

description: Have you ever wondered what it is like to be Wild Cheetah? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling! Join the battle in this super epic adventure delivered in stunning 3D. Be a Wild Cheetah and survive in the wilderness as long as you can. Start your own family of cheetahs, fight against fierce animals like lion, crocodile and rhino. Evolve your Cheetah to become the strongest Cheetah ever.FEATURES:REALISTIC SIMULATORMaintain your health and energy by eating and drinking water, raise your family, explore massive world, fight other animals to become more powerfulSTART YOUR FAMILYWild Cheetah Sim features the ability to have real family. descriptionHTML:
Have you ever wondered what it is like to be Wild Cheetah? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling! Join the battle in this super epic adventure delivered in stunning 3D. Be a Wild Cheetah and survive in the wilderness as long as you can. Start your own family of cheetahs, fight against fierce animals like lion, crocodile and rhino. Evolve your Cheetah to become the strongest Cheetah ever.

FEATURES:

REALISTIC SIMULATOR
Maintain your health and energy by eating and drinking water, raise your family, explore massive world, fight other animals to become more powerful

START YOUR FAMILY
Wild Cheetah Sim features the ability to have real family. Family members are not only good companions but they can be trained to fight along side in combat

REAL DAY AND NIGHT
Wild Cheetah Sim has a real in-game cycle of day and night on a 24 hour based time system. For every 24 minutes that the game is played, a full day and night cycle of 24 hours passes in the game

ACHIEVEMENTS
The game features achievement system. Unlock the achievements by hunting specific animals and discover amazing facts about Cheetah.


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
- RPG-style gameplay: level up, evolve, complete quests
- Different options of appearance for cheetah
- Information tab in game menu to view characteristics of animals
- Rotatable camera, zoom in and out
- Realistic environments, big world
- A lot of real animals to hunt
- Quest system, 20 missions to complete
- Awesome 3D graphics

comments: My 4 year old loves this game! Good graphics, easy controls (both touch and tilt), challenging for him but not too challenging that he gets mad... Being able to race as Turbo is a little pricy but not horrible if you buy all the snails as a package.

One of the WORST apps i've ever used! The game itself is pretty good actually, but the Ads are the most terrible thing i've ever seen! right now im being dead serious when i say that after every button that you click, you get an ad in your face, and the game is designed like that, that you will 90% CLICK the add!

It is a great game but, there is too many ads.. I really restart alot on racing games and this is annoying, it makes me having a temper.. I will really suggest to remove a bit of ads to stay us calm, you guys really know that there are people who rage quit and just uninstall you're game. Gaming Companies like your may not like that. Thank you for reading this message.

comments: Awesome but needs some cool upgrades Its not that the game isnt good, its AMAZING! I love the we bare bears series i watch it every day! The game can be challenging at times but u shd add a hard mode for those who want a challenge. U know the guy in the episode when they worked at the cupcake place? He couldnt decide wut to get. So, u shd add him in the hard mode. After every 15 seconds, he will change his order. Motivating the players to play quickly so he wouldnt change his orders. Plz add this in the game.. keep it up! Like if like idea!

There is alot of work to be done. Advertisements in the middle of game play that force you to start the round over, when I do get through a round the play and back buttons do not work, I have to press the actual back button on my phone to start a new match. I loose all my points/coins after every round and cannot upgrade anything as a result of the memory loss after every round. I love the game but it needs ALOT of work and I can only wonder how this game could be released with so little testing.Droid Turbo

Easy and entertaining Love the we bear bears series. And enjoy the game so much. Just a suggestion maybe there's should ve an option of whice item we want to use after purchased. Cos I bought 2stove but seems like a waste of money cos cant use the old one anymore.

I ABSOLUTELY love this game such an amazing way to spend some time or kill time. The game play is great it keeps you on your feet funny. Tons of things you can add to ice bears kitchen. I can't say anymore more on how to describe this game. Cartoon network keep it up!!!.👍

It's okay... Kind of slow... would be fun if we can buy upgrades for the stove (like speed to cook faster)...  And a side to add a plate if we made a mistake/extra food... instead of throwing it away.  Cooking process for me is too slow, compared to other cooking games.  Cute concept though.

This is a very nice app. We buy things from the shop,we cook them for the customers.....A very good Time pass. Just one thing...there are many adds. Pease remove them then the game will be perfect. Thank you..

comments: Needs a bit of polishing, good game tho, potentially the best rally game on mobile. Can't edit my name or the co-diver, sometimes the controls don't act as expected and some pace notes are given too late or wrong....sort these problems out and add some content(cars/stages/whatnot) and it's a winner

Really liked the handling of the car, a lot. Want to play this game for hours. But ... screen blacks out mid way through race, usually just before or on a hairpin. If you could just stabalize this, would be a brilliant game.
The game is nice controls are good. But could have been better. The game is not optimized for samsaung high end devices also iuse samsung s8 but it still lag a lot.
BORING GOT ME SNORING. Come on I've got to b honest this as potential but lacks excitement !
I really love this game, it has lots of potential. Please add manual transmission and stabilize the overall performance of the game and I'll come back an rate 5 stars
Very nice and addictive...maybe graphics could have been more realistic.
description: If you are looking for REAL mobile rally simulation, than you are in the right place. Race at 60 fps in mud, snow, dirt and asphalt in this fast-paced racing game.AMAZING ACTION!Prove yourself fast in daytime and nighttime tracks, dare to speed in hostile conditions and terrain, drift along the turns and pay attention to your co-driver's pacenotes (Or he will get mad, we can assure it!).DRIVE ON REAL-WORLD TRACKS!Drive on awesome tracks: they are all modeled around existing and famous rally tracks, feel every little road's roughness, run on the edge of a pitfall, feel the breeze of the Alps' snow and the heat of the Mexico sun!AMAZING CARS!Customize the driver's name and the name of your co-pilot together with their country flags and stick them on your car's window! Get your livery dirty while trying to nail that turn, chose among a lot of different cars, each with its handling and performance!TAKE THE LEAD!Chose among two different championships: J-SPEC for beginners and S-SPEC for legendary drivers! Will you get to top??CHALLENGE THE WORLD!Smash the leaderboards and show the world you are the fastest rally driver around... or show to them right on track: with multiplayer mode you can challenge a friend or players from all over the world!Get M.U.D. Rally now, join the Rally!
descriptionHTML:
If you are looking for REAL mobile rally simulation, than you are in the right place. Race at 60 fps in mud, snow, dirt and asphalt in this fast-paced racing game.

AMAZING ACTION!
Prove yourself fast in daytime and nighttime tracks, dare to speed in hostile conditions and terrain, drift along the turns and pay attention to your co-driver's pacenotes (Or he will get mad, we can assure it!).

DRIVE ON REAL-WORLD TRACKS!
Drive on awesome tracks: they are all modeled around existing and famous rally tracks, feel every little road's roughness, run on the edge of a pitfall, feel the breeze of the Alps' snow and the heat of the Mexico sun!

AMAZING CARS!
Customize the driver's name and the name of your co-pilot together with their country flags and stick them on your car's window! Get your livery dirty while trying to nail that turn, chose among a lot of different cars, each with its handling and performance!

TAKE THE LEAD!
Chose among two different championships: J-SPEC for beginners and S-SPEC for legendary drivers! Will you get to top??

CHALLENGE THE WORLD!
Smash the leaderboards and show the world you are the fastest rally driver around... or show to them right on track: with multiplayer mode you can challenge a friend or players from all over the world!

Get M.U.D. Rally now, join the Rally!

comments: Started off with one ticket, then I got another ten, then after a few more spins got another ten tickets, after that I got a few other things like coins and cars, then got more tickets and so on. I got all the cars with the tickets from spinning the wheel and I have so much money now, and I don't know what to do with it, I have already got all the cars. It is a fun game it just needs some improvement that's all. I have around 60000 coins and 70 tickets

Supercalifragisticexpailidocious! This game is not similar to Loop Taxi at all! So if you think that it is, try it please. Give the creators some love and try their game. It's very easy and fun! I garuntee once you try it, you will absolutely love it! And I'm very sorry if it didn't work out for you. Although I'm sure that won't happen to anybody. Thank you creator, creators, or company who created this game. I recommend this game to everyone that lays eyes on it, and please share this game with your friends and family. Best game EVER! 😘😉
Thanks for the auto reply, idiots! Big coins don't count towards total? Bought a double coin car and the large coins which I believe are supposed to be worth 10 don't add coins at all.

Fun game, annoying ads I was having fun with the game but the ads are intrusive to the point of frustration. I uninstalled it after the fourth noisy video ad popped up in about 5 minutes of play. The only option to remove ads is to buy a car that costs over $20. If there were an option to pay$1 - $5 to remove ads, or if the ads weren't so loud while I have the game on silent, I would have been happy. Fun, simple game, but if I have the game sounds off, the ads should be silent too.

Repetitive and lots of ads. The idea is good. The graphics look nice. But a full 20 second advertisement video after EVERY round.. That got annoying pretty quick! Also there is not much variation.. You just go in circles.. and go.. and go.. and..

No Challenge after unlocking everything Bug bug bug...big coins which come up as game progresses don't add to the total coin collection... Also the last car which u unlock which has double life & double coins feature has issue of scoring.. the total score does not pass "3" even though in actual u hav completed more than 3 rounds
description: The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car. Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
descriptionHTML:
The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!
New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!

As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.
Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car.
Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.
Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.
Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.
Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
developerAddress: RAK FREE TRADE ZONE BLDG PO 10055
summary: Race in circles at full speed, keep your eyes on other cars and do not crash!
title: Loop Drive 2

comments: So lovely! Good game. You can easily make money and food, breeding and nurturing are pretty fast, unlike other games where you'd have to wait 24 hours or more for things to be done. Interactions with dogs are amazing, thet do so many tricks! I do have some issues with notifications (as in , I never get any ) and the packs; the game freezes completely when I take free or daily packs and sometimes when I restart the game I don't get the bonus from the packs at all.. And I was never able to watch videos for free packs.That is sad, but other than that this game really deserves 5 stars.

I got this game a couple of weeks ago and with the newest update, I can't do anything. Any time I try to click on a dog, the oven to get food, or anywhere, nothing happens. It's frustrating and I don't want to get rid of this game. Fix this problem please, I am too far in this game to restart.
Really like the game but the spin wheel is a joke. Total waste of gems getting the same result each time you try again. Impossible to get more than a 2 star dog. Getting annoyed! Seems rigged to me!
Its an awesome game. Way better than i expected. So easy to earn things and breed etc. The only problem i got right now is that it wont load for some reason. But will keep trying

The game itself is fun and i like it, but its way to hard to get tokens to buy dog cards. Especially when one dog card can cost 1,000 or more tokens. Right now I'm stuck in the main quests because i can't level my dogs up enough because I can't get enough tokens without paying real money.

Wish there is a way yo can buy certain dogs with cash bc you can never land on the certain dogs, it get almost there then it does back. Wondering if you already have one of a certain breed can we plz buy the other colors to thwt breed so you can really collect other then always getting the same dog and color everytime, or atleast when you have a certain dogs renové that one from the spin so you want get everytime!!!  Plz help
description: Dog Town is a FREE pet caring simulation game where you can collect dog cards and dogs like: basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds with a large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players. Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where their dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that players would feel attached to their dogs just like they would to the real ones.In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom and breed like Dachshund, Corgi , Chihuahua, Labrador, Beagle, Miniature Pinscher, Siberian Husky, Doberman, Pomeranian, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel, Shnauzer, Great Dane, Bull Terrier, Yorkshire Terrier, Australian Shepherd, Labrador Retriever, Boston Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, basset hound and many others puppies! Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!Start collecting your dogs now and show your own collection to the world!FEATURES★ Gorgeous 3D environment! ★ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior! ★ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!★ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!★ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!★ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!PLEASE NOTE!This game is still in early development.And a network connection is required.UPCOMING FEATURES● Interaction with the dogs● Translation (German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese and few more)● More dogs and decorations● Backyard / Minigames ● Dog dressup and competition with friendsUpcoming dog breeds: basset hound, Dachshund, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chihuahua, Corgi, Labrador, Beagle, Springer Spaniel, Miniature Pinscher, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Siberian Husky, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Doberman,  Bull Terrier, Pomeranian,  Great Dane, Shnauzer, French Bulldog,  Cocker Spaniel and other dogs.Best dog simulation and pet rescue game ever!If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com

descriptionHTML:
Adopt and take care of super cute and furry kittens with pet vet Chloe!

Sweet Baby Girl Chloe loves animals and helps to take care of little kittens in the Sweet Baby Girl Cat Shelter. Join her and have tons of furry fun! Mr. Fluffy is really hungry, precious little Snowflake is waiting for a bath, snuggly Whiskers needs eye doctor help and adventurous Oliver has a broken tail. Don't forget to clean up the cat shelter with pet vet Chloe!

Sweet Baby Girl Cat Shelter kitten care games for kids and toddlers:
· Play and take care of four little kittens: Mr. Fluffy, Snowflake, Whiskers and Oliver!
· Feed Mr. Fluffy - cook the most delicious fish with pet vet Chloe!
· Give Snowflake a bath - shower, shampoo, dry and comb her soft white fur, then trim and color the claws!
· Dress up Snowflake - choose the cutest collar and stylish kitty cat accessories!
· Treat Oliver's broken tail - use the X-ray machine, fix the tail and help Olive feel much better!
· Play cat eye doctor and treat Whiskers' eyes - he needs new glasses!
· Clean up with pet vet Chloe - wipe, sweep, polish, vacuum, change the litter box and throw away the trash!
· Collect super cute kitten stickers and watch videos for kids!


ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they really love.
Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

PRIVACY
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!! The game offers online mission races (in multiplayer mode) where you can compete with real players, defeat them, and earn more money.          Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen. The side areas with the control buttons are inactive. To successfully activate the interactive parts of the game, you must first drag the component of interest to the center of the screen while in 360-degree mode. Press to confirm your selection.    Game features: - Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun quest- and arcade-style missions.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! There are 3 ways to acquire new cars: for free, at a discount, or by buying the car in the showroom.  Bonus! Police cruiser.  Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games
descriptionHTML:
You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time.
Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting.
You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.
Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!

The game offers online mission races (in multiplayer mode) where you can compete with real players, defeat them, and earn more money.

Tips:
1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your car.
2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket.
3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.
4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.
5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.
6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.

Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen. The side areas with the control buttons are inactive.
To successfully activate the interactive parts of the game, you must first drag the component of interest to the center of the screen while in 360-degree mode. Press to confirm your selection.

Game features:
- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.
- Daily bonuses.
- First-person mode.
- Richly detailed car models.
- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.
- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways.
- Interesting map of the city and its environs.
- Interactive gas station.
- Fun quest- and arcade-style missions.
- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.

Additional bonus!
The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely,
and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!!

Hint!
There are 3 ways to acquire new cars: for free, at a discount, or by buying the car in the showroom.

Bonus!
Police cruiser.

Play the beta versions. Follow us!
Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.

Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!

description: Hungry? Why eat boring normal food when you can eat colorful and trendy UNICORN food?! Help Ashley, the queen of all things unicorn, live her life with unicorn-colored glasses! Make delicious unicorn food including cakes and ice cream, dress up in glittery rainbow outfits, and enjoy the unicorn lifestyle with Ashley and the other unicorn girls!Ashley is a supercool teen - she’s one of those awesome girls who likes to live like a glitter unicorn! She covers herself in head-to-toe sparkly rainbow garb, styles her hair like a unicorn, and eats delicious rainbow colored unicorn-themed food - she especially loves to bake rainbow cakes! Not to mention her adorable unicorn nails! Help her enjoy her colorful unicorn world with her unicorn-loving friends to the fullest!Features:>Bake colorful and delicious unicorn cakes with Ashley and the girls! Which of these cakes is your favorite: Classic Unicorn or Dripping Rainbow?>Dress Ashley up in the prettiest glittery unicorn outfits! Give her that rainbow style that makes her pop!>Make heavenly colorful unicorn drinks with Ashley - hot chocolate is yummy, but unicorn hot chocolate is OUT OF THIS WORLD!>Style Ashley and her friends’ hair like a unicorn! description: Switch your car to the boat, jet or even a windsurfing board in this new Jet Racing game! Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Control your ship with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and dives on it's way. This game can be played by the whole family! Invite your family and play together!Prepare for a race by picking one of the fast sailing rides! Gain enough speed to jump over the ramps or dive deep into the ocean. You will love all the surprises in each level (you can even meet dolphins here)! There are also plenty of coins to collect for better results while sailing for the win! Lets start the engine or catch the wind and swim to the finish in the shortest time possible! The controls are so simple that anyone can play this game without any problems!The levels are designed so that you would do many stunts on the run, the ship will spin doing flips - but watch out not to land on the roof! You will quickly learn that this speed jet boat game is crazy and full of laugh-generating moments. Try yourself!

descriptionHTML:
It is high time for you to start mining of bitcoins. Get the bitcoins with your own farm. Buy improvements and develop your empire.
They filled the whole house with bitcoins, make all the free space farms, let them get even more bitcoins. In fact bitcoin does not happen much. Sell ​​the cue ball on the stock exchange, along with altcoin and etherium. The constant change in the exchange of currencies, the dynamic rate of bitcoin, the rise in prices, prices are constantly changing. If you like the price, press to sell and get your dollars.
For those who do not know what bitcoin or mining is. Mining is prey. Bitcoin is a crypto currency, a currency very popular on the Internet. There are also alternative crypto-currencies, such as ether, or etherium, altcoin, Ripple - the fastest crypto currency, lightcoin and others.
The game has a huge number of locations that you can fill up with your farms and assim. Asik is a special installation for the crypto currency.
Build your business on a crypto currency, this will ensure you a good payroll in the game, and you can buy a gold installation in your apartment.
Compete with all the ministers of our planet and become the best! Become a Bitcoin Tycoon!

description: Mommy is out for her baby birth and you need to clean the bathroom. The bathroom should not be dirty as it is full of filth and germs. Hygiene is necessary so this game allows you to clean all the dirt and filth there is for a hygienic healthy life. The bathroom is very dirty and full of germs, and you’re the only one who can clean up all the mess. Even if you have the star girl princess Emma, she still has to clean the bathroom.There are a wide variety of cleaning tools available at your disposal so you have to select different tools and clean out the mess. In this fun filled game, you can clean the toilet by using a sponge and brush, making the toilet germs free. There are different scenes available that requires your help in cleaning them. Scenes include Toilet, shower, basin, tub and floor. The bathroom is a disaster so everything is out of its place and mommy’s going to be home very soon. It is your task to place objects at their places and make the bathroom clean and tidy before mom finds out about the mess. To make the game challenging and entertaining, mini games have been added to get the game going with fun. So don’t miss this game and be the best bathroom cleaner there is.Features:•	Clean your princess’s Emma Bathroom•	Quick shower scene cleaning, don’t let mommy find out•	Tub and Floor scene cleaning•	Place objects at their places and keep everything organized•	Mini games that you won’t find in any other bathroom clean up games
descriptionHTML:
Mommy is out for her baby birth and you need to clean the bathroom. The bathroom should not be dirty as it is full of filth and germs. Hygiene is necessary so this game allows you to clean all the dirt and filth there is for a hygienic healthy life. The bathroom is very dirty and full of germs, and you’re the only one who can clean up all the mess. Even if you have the star girl princess Emma, she still has to clean the bathroom.


There are a wide variety of cleaning tools available at your disposal so you have to select different tools and clean out the mess. Scenes include Toilet, shower, basin, tub and floor.


The bathroom is a disaster so everything is out of its place and mommy’s going to be home very soon. It is your task to place objects at their places and make the bathroom clean and tidy before mom finds out about the mess.


To make the game challenging and entertaining, mini games have been added to get the game going with fun. So don’t miss this game and be the best bathroom cleaner there is.
Features:

• Quick shower scene cleaning, don’t let mommy find out

• Place objects at their places and keep everything organized
• Mini games that you won’t find in any other bathroom clean up games
summary: Clean your bathroom with your mommy and show her your cleaning skills
title: Bathroom Clean Up & Makeover

comments: Been playing this game for quite some time now. I believe I first installed it in 2014. It's addictive and super fun. Similar to Paper Toss. description: There's a Jerk in every office. A know-it-all, overachiever who comes in early, stays late and kisses up to the boss. comments: It's a great game... When I get to play it. But there are so many stupid ads that it completely ruins the game. I totally get that I have to watch ads to not have to pay for it. But having to watch an ad between every level and then another one if I have to restart the level is ridiculous. I spent majority of my time just waiting for the ads to go away. Uninstalling

This is wasting time i downloaded it.  You have to buy candies for play. If you lose a game or if you want to play a game twice your candy will decrease . So your candy will decrease slowly slowly. And at once you will have no candy. So dont download it. It is waste of time. Thanks for seeing my review.

I am sad to write that this game is trying to grab money. The fact that have to pay $15 in order to get unlimited candies makes me mad. I had this game when it first came out a few years ago. I just recently wanted remenisce this game and it turns to be a money grabber. I am also sad to write until change happens, i will never download another app made by zeptolab

It's amazing how bad this app has become, with this humongous amount of imposed, unskippable ads! The game is excellent; I used to love it years ago, but now this app is just a money grabber. I'm very disappointed, and sadly uninstalling it in this very moment.

The game is fun and sometimes challenging but for every 5 seconds of playing the game I have to watch a 30 second commercial.  I know the commercials make it free, but it is beyond ridiculous when i spend 6x more time watching the commercials than playing the game.  I might as well just turn on the TV.

It used to be like the regular Cut the Rope ... until now I have to spend candies on replay & level advances. It used to be relaxing yet challenging but now I have to think of the candies. Why wreck an already okay system??? What a party pooper.
description: Experiment to feed Om Nom candy! Cut the rope like never before. Everything you love and new gameplay! 200 levels and more to come! Eager to learn more about Om Nom's adventures? Watch "Om Nom Stories" cartoons and other amazing videos on our YouTube channel!www.zep.tl/youtubeThe little green monster Om Nom is back and hungrier than ever! Team up with the Professor, a mad (but not bad!) scientist determined to study Om Nom’s candy-loving behavior through a series of experiments. Use suction cups and other funny devices to collect shiny gold stars, uncover hidden prizes and unlock new levels! Key features: - 8 level packs with 200 levels - Innovative physics gameplay- Adorable character- Outstanding graphics- Om Nom animation shorts- Superpowers- Constant free updates with new levels and animationsAbout the game: “Cut the Rope: Experiments from ZeptoLab follows the exact same formula as its predecessor, which means it's awesome.” - IGN “If Cut the Rope: Experiments uncovers one scientific truth, it’s this: ZeptoLab knows how to put together a charming puzzle game.” - Tapscape “Cut the Rope: Experiments takes the original's addictive formula and adds a splash of deviousness, thanks to the addition of some cunning new items.” - Pocket Gamer---------Now you can earn free superpowers by trying new apps from Getjar. All these permissions allows us to give you Superpowers and Star Key for free. "Get Tasks" permission.  This allows us to give you free Superpowers. If you install an app for a free Superpower, this permission tells us when you have opened it.  No other data is captured or stored."Get Accounts" permission.  This creates a user account for you so you can restore upgrades and purchases."Access Network State" permission. This allows us to determine if WiFi is available and use that instead of the Carrier Network."Internet" permission. This allows us to communicate on the internet."Read Phone State" permission. This is required by some advertisers. No private data is captured or stored. Help us improve our games.  We love your feedback.  Contact us at support@zeptolab.com.
descriptionHTML:
Experiment to feed Om Nom candy! Cut the rope like never before. Everything you love and new gameplay! 200 levels and more to come!

Eager to learn more about Om Nom's adventures? Watch "Om Nom Stories" cartoons and other amazing videos on our YouTube channel!
www.zep.tl/youtube

The little green monster Om Nom is back and hungrier than ever! Team up with the Professor, a mad (but not bad!) scientist determined to study Om Nom’s candy-loving behavior through a series of experiments. Use suction cups and other funny devices to collect shiny gold stars, uncover hidden prizes and unlock new levels!

Key features:

- 8 level packs with 200 levels
- Innovative physics gameplay
- Adorable character
- Outstanding graphics
- Om Nom animation shorts
- Superpowers
- Constant free updates with new levels and animations

About the game:

“Cut the Rope: Experiments from ZeptoLab follows the exact same formula as its predecessor, which means it's awesome.” - IGN

“If Cut the Rope: Experiments uncovers one scientific truth, it’s this: ZeptoLab knows how to put together a charming puzzle game.” - Tapscape

“Cut the Rope: Experiments takes the original's addictive formula and adds a splash of deviousness, thanks to the addition of some cunning new items.” - Pocket Gamer

---------
Now you can earn free superpowers by trying new apps from Getjar. All these permissions allows us to give you Superpowers and Star Key for free.

"Get Tasks" permission. This allows us to give you free Superpowers. If you install an app for a free Superpower, this permission tells us when you have opened it. No other data is captured or stored.
"Get Accounts" permission. This creates a user account for you so you can restore upgrades and purchases.
"Access Network State" permission. This allows us to determine if WiFi is available and use that instead of the Carrier Network.
"Internet" permission. This allows us to communicate on the internet.
"Read Phone State" permission. This is required by some advertisers. No private data is captured or stored.

Help us improve our games. We love your feedback. Contact us at support@zeptolab.com.

Zeptolab UK
Suite/ Office/ Flat 161
2 Old Brompton Road
SW7 3DQ London

summary: Cut the ropes, deliver candy to Om Nom, collect stars, and unlock new levels.
title: Cut the Rope: Experiments FREE

comments: enjoy this game, welldone!!   Suggestion: can bring 2 or 3 weapons and swap in battle.    Hint for newbie, tripple bow is the key.   Dont waste money on entry level of each weapon, always save for the strongest. 1st start with tripple spear. The poison blowgun is good for earning money in training but very for later game level 80+  Get 25k is pretty easy to earn in daily rewards and training. I can get it in a few hours quickly, each training 4-10k point.

- if you are playing the game there is no option to get out of the app or to go to the main menu or restart the play.  - bug: even if the player is dead the game does not terminates this Happens for 5 times in 100 that is not a good show. - I loved played the app but I think you should test the app for the bugs and some missing functional points  - over all I will rate app 4 star & good

This is an excellent little arcade game with simple but challenging controls. I like the variety of different weapons you get to choose from and the graphics are lovely and evoke a kind of 'dawn of time' feel. The only criticism would be that earning ivory (the in game currency) is slow and there are no other options to obtain apart from buying some.

One of the best challenging game I've played so far. In the beginning it seems a very tough game (specially the terror bird story) but eventually you'll fall in track. One thing I would like to suggest that in gameplay, if there is an option to change the weapon (maybe in between 2 alternatives), then it would be more interesting. Thanks.

I have been playing for a good while now, however I had to take a break from playing for work and when I came back all my progress was gone. I I still have my achievements to show for it but I'd like my progress to be returned to me and I'll gladly rate better. Thank you.

Its great and addicting and has very little ads. The only thing I don't like is that the amount of levels needed to move on in the game and the prices if weapons are a bit too much. I would give it like a 4.8/5

descriptionHTML:
◆ Popular game that achieved 10 million downloads worldwide!

​An intense hunting game of starving tribal people!
Hunt the primeval gigantic animals!

Long time ago, a bushman tribe lived in an outback town.
People were starving to death because of continuous droughts
The leader of the tribe goes out for hunting every day for living.....

Big Hunter is a dynamic physics game that hunts gigantic primeval animals with spear, axe and boomerang. Become the world's best hunter with a variety of weapons!

Big Hunter Features:
- Easy control with addictive touch of hitting
- Hunting game based on dynamic physics
- Simple but outstanding graphic design
- Rhythmical game sounds
- Challenge to the 100 levels with the near impossible!
- Show off your Hunt skills to all your friends via SMS, Facebook, Twitter, and more!

Big Hunter supports high resolution for an optimal gaming experience on both phones and tablets.

description: Beware police duty driver! It is a Warning situation & tough job to carry Labradors or German Shepherds from training centers to city municipal police. After all.. They are needed in police detective teams .. So, Take trained dogs in cargo transporter truck to reach police stations on time. Yes Police Dog Transport Truck is a tough driving job with red alerts for the driver who has to complete cargo delivery safely without any car stunts. City subway crime also needs police dogs’ assistance & also for border patrol for security cops. So do not make these proficient & skilled animals be late for cop dog duty with police warden in this 3D simulator. Hey Cop transporter truck driver! Be initiator of protection of your beloved city subway, amusement parks & restaurants on Christmas & New Year’s holidays! Police officers need help to arrest criminals & chase convicts escaping from the hands of border police. They also need to suspect strolling prisoners in city streets, Hence be a master cop driver & transport expensive dogs with full protection in this police duty simulator. Remember! Take these police assets safely to cop stations .. By making sure you do not hit a trailer truck or cargo lorry in this highway driving mania. Also protect your mini van, which has expensive animals as cargo delivery to be taken as shipment in best condition. These animals .. After all have to protect citizens from terrorist attacks especially shopping malls & city halls , where services are being conducted. Complete Police Duty ! Dog training is complete & there isn’t any time to waste finances. So, complete transportation in police van with special cage Winter holidays are her on the edge .. and full security protocol needs patriotic role from each and everyone in country .. So complete transportation of sniffer dogs of best breeds like Rottweiler, Labrador retriever & Doberman to scare swags & criminals ready for attack.  Why Police Dog Transport Truck driving is important ? These doggies are the breeds who can protect innocent passengers from criminal attacks & terrorists who have not been considered by army. Military planes & army tanks cannot be taken to busy city, but instead you need to solve cases in urban areas with the help of police dogs like ultimate canine…So download this city savior & animal heroic role play … Police Dog Transport Truck Sim to ignite the sense of life achievement in this instinct chasing simulator.

description: Real RC Flight Sim 2016 Free now for mobiles! Be amazed by the realism and controls of this Remote Control Flight Simulator 2016!You will fly with 15 different aircrafts in more than 14 high detailed scenarios! We included the virtual RC Controller on the screen fully configurable and a physics algorithm very close to what you can do with your real RC plane. With more then 150 missions to play, master all the maneuvers you can do with a rc!MAIN FEATURES:- 15 airplanes (trainers, WWII planes, Fighter Jets and commercial Jets)- 14 scenarios, in different countries, like USA, Germany and more!- Maneuver checks in real time!- 150 missions- Special controls for jet wings, Corsair wings (fold and unfold wings) on RC controller.Feel free to contact us at FlyWings Studios to give your feedback, have a nice flight!Credits:Photo scenes by Harald Bendschneider
descriptionHTML:
Real RC Flight Sim 2016 Free now for mobiles! Be amazed by the realism and controls of this Remote Control Flight Simulator 2016!

You will fly with 15 different aircrafts in more than 14 high detailed scenarios! We included the virtual RC Controller on the screen fully configurable and a physics algorithm very close to what you can do with your real RC plane. - 15 airplanes (trainers, WWII planes, Fighter Jets and commercial Jets)

Feel free to contact us at FlyWings Studios to give your feedback, have a nice flight!
